name: Story Journal
description: Achievements related to the story journal.

achievements.name: "Where's Balthazar?"
achievements.description: Journal: "Where's Balthazar?" Completed
achievements.requirement: Stay on Balthazar's trail.

achievements.name: Shining Blade Secrets
achievements.description: Journal: Shining Blade Secrets Completed
achievements.requirement: Talk to Anise about the Shining Blade's plans.

achievements.name: On Orrian Shores
achievements.description: Journal: On Orrian Shores Completed
achievements.requirement: Search Orr for new leads.

achievements.name: The Flow of Magic
achievements.description: Journal: The Flow of Magic Completed
achievements.requirement: Power up the shrines of Orr.

achievements.name: The Last Chance
achievements.description: Journal: The Last Chance Completed
achievements.requirement: Help the Shining Blade finish what they started.

data.name: Mini Lazarus
data.description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

achievements.name: Not on My Watch
achievements.description:
Story Instance: "Where's Balthazar?"

"Your friends aren't coming."
achievements.requirement: Kill the White Mantle guarding the second crystal shard without letting them call reinforcements.

achievements.name: Graffiti Artist
achievements.description:
Story Instance: "Where's Balthazar?"

"Don't you think it would look better like this?"
achievements.requirement: Destroy a statue in the hideout.

achievements.name: Art Critic
achievements.description:
Story Instance: "Where's Balthazar?"

"I may not know art, but I know what I dislike."
achievements.requirement: Destroy all statues in the hideout.

achievements.name: With Friends Like These...
achievements.description:
Story Instance: "Where's Balthazar?"

"Look what I can do!"
achievements.requirement: Activate all the runes around the exemplar while she's trapped in the White Mantle hideout.

achievements.name: Block the Shock
achievements.description:
Story Instance: "Where's Balthazar?"

"No elementals for you!"
achievements.requirement: Kill Justiciar Araya without letting her summon any unstable elementals.

achievements.name: "One Path Ends" Mastery
achievements.description: Trying to make a difference...
achievements.requirement: Complete all  "One Path Ends" achievements.

data.name: Mursaat Brogan Box
data.description: Open to choose a set of Mursaat Brogans.

achievements.name: Lightfoot
achievements.description:
Story Instance: The Last Chance

"One foot in front of the other..."
achievements.requirement: Traverse Abaddon's reliquary without any member of your party taking damage from fire traps.

achievements.name: A Quick Death
achievements.description:
Story Instance: The Last Chance

"The only mercy left for you is a quick death."
achievements.requirement: Achieve victory within nine minutes of starting the final battle.

achievements.name: Dodger Danger
achievements.description:
Story Instance: The Last Chance

"Bob and weave."
achievements.requirement: Succeed without taking damage from lightning.

achievements.name: Precision Blade
achievements.description:
Story Instance: Shining Blade Secrets

"I will slit your traitorous throat! To arms!"
—Exemplar Kerida
achievements.requirement: Kill 50 White Mantle invaders at the Henge of Denravi.

achievements.name: Hold the Line
achievements.description:
Story Instance: Shining Blade Secrets

"Just a little longer..."
achievements.requirement: Survive the assault on the Henge of Denravi for at least 5 minutes.

achievements.name: Fearless
achievements.description:
Story Instance: Shining Blade Secrets

"Self-confidence in spades."
achievements.requirement: Defeat the Manifestation of Self-Doubt in the Shining Blade headquarters without using Minor Breakthrough to help you.

achievements.name: Fearful
achievements.description:
Story Instance: Shining Blade Secrets

"Get away! Get away!"
achievements.requirement: Defeat the Manifestation of Self-Doubt in the Shining Blade headquarters by using Minor Breakthrough for help.

achievements.name: Two Sides, Same Coin
achievements.description:
Story Instance: Shining Blade Secrets

"You can have it both ways."
achievements.requirement: Complete both Fearless and Fearful achievements.

achievements.name: Risen Research
achievements.description: The more you know!
achievements.requirement: Collect the lost journal entries.

bits.text: Page One: Caught within the Risen Lowlands.
Page Two: Studying the Orrian gorillas.
Page Three: Atop an ancient citadel.
Page Six: Whispers from the wind.
Page Seven: Statues of a fallen god.

achievements.description: It's all that's left to remember her by.

achievements.requirement: Defeat the hiding kingpin.

achievements.description: Let them fight.

achievements.description: Be one with the sound.

achievements.description: Journal: Elder Druid Protection Completed

achievements.description: Taking the scenic route...

achievements.description: Danger everywhere.
achievements.requirement: Find the hidden chest in the golemancer's tomb.

achievements.description: Of fearsome molten visage and mighty smoldering wings.
achievements.requirement: Slay either the legendary Destroyer Aestus or the legendary Destroyer Ignis near the Boiling Sea.

achievements.description: There's a new king in town.
achievements.requirement: Slay the champion stonehead king near Heathen's Hold.

achievements.description: What a fun guy.
achievements.requirement: Slay champion Emperor Mattake near Ancient Hollow.

achievements.description: Technological growth never ceases.
achievements.requirement: Destroy the champion Inquest agent in the power suit, near Rata Arcanum.

achievements.requirement: Slay the champion webby mother near Ancient Hollow.

achievements.name: Nature's Wrath
achievements.description: Beware disturbing a spirit's slumber.
achievements.requirement: Slay the champion greater wardbough near Savage Rise.

achievements.name: Wurm Slurper
achievements.description: Yet another victim of the bloodstone fad diet.
achievements.requirement: Slay the champion bloodstone-charged lava wurm in Heathen's Hold.

achievements.description: Urge to grill rising!
achievements.requirement: Slay a champion molten desecrator near Titan's Throat.

achievements.name: Crypt Keeper
achievements.description: Hope it's not cursed.

data.name: Magic-Warped Bundle
data.description: Contains rare crafting materials.

achievements.description: "I'll create a BLUI interface using virtual cones—see if I can track the device." —Taimi
achievements.requirement: Hack Inquest terminals.

achievements.name: Burnin' Down the House
achievements.description: "There has got to be a way!"
achievements.requirement: Destroy a mercenary turret.

achievements.name: People Watching
achievements.description: You have to get the perfect angle.
achievements.requirement: Plant scanners for the Whispers agent.

bits.text: Find the missing golem and learn the password.
Find the Whispers agent, give him the password, and obtain the scanners.
This scanner should overlook the mercenary base.
This scanner should be atop a high tree.
This scanner should overlook the Inquest camp.
This scanner should watch Tennon and Tinderbough.
This scanner should overlook the mercenary submarine.
This scanner should watch the spiders from a stalactite.
This scanner should watch the mercenary leader.

achievements.name: Hot Splashes
achievements.description: Just a casual dip in another hollow volcano.
achievements.requirement: Acquire diving goggles near the gate of fire, and dive into the bucket floating in the boiling sea.

achievements.name: Excess Energy
achievements.description:
Story Instance: Heart of the Volcano

"Leaving stray Elder Dragon energy around probably won't cause any problems...but better safe than sorry."
achievements.requirement: Find all the lingering fragments of Primordus and Jormag energy in the Heart of the Volcano instance.

achievements.name: Fancy Flying
achievements.description:
Story Instance: Heart of the Volcano

"Like a moth to the flame."
achievements.requirement: Descend the chimney in the Heart of the Volcano instance without being hit by destroyer fireballs.

data.name: Fire Orchid Blossom
data.description: Can be consumed for unbound magic or traded with vendors.

achievements.name: Go Nuts with the Scanning
achievements.description:
Story Instance: Heart of the Volcano

"A Scan a Day..."
achievements.requirement: Find all unique objects and creatures in the Heart of the Volcano instance that respond to Taimi's scanner.

achievements.name: The Druid Stone
achievements.description: Melandru's blessing to the most devout of her followers was to become one with nature and leave behind their physical construct. Pay tribute to and learn from the druid spirits in Draconis Mons to cultivate your relationship with nature through the Druid Stone.

achievements.name: Awakening the Druid Stone
achievements.description: Continue to cultivate your relationship with nature through tributes to the druid spirits of Draconis Mons.

achievements.name: Sprouting the Druid Stone
achievements.description: Continue to cultivate your relationship with nature through tributes to the druid spirits of Draconis Mons.

achievements.name: A Henge Away from Home
achievements.description: Your dedication to nature is proving fruitful, but there is still much to do. Continue to show your respect for Melandru's druids and help bring their magic out into the world again.

achievements.name: Lessons Learned
achievements.description: Knowledge itself is power.
achievements.requirement: Find all 14 of the golemancer's lost recordings in Draconis Mons.

data.name: Sentient Singularity
data.description: Double-click to feed 150 Unbound Magic to the Sentient Singularity. The singularity can devour a limited amount of magic each day.

achievements.name: Born for Battle
achievements.description:
Story Instance: Taimi's Pet Project

"AAAARRRRRGGHHH!"
achievements.requirement: Defeat ten mercenaries during the final surge.

data.name: Magic-Warped Packet

It burns, burns, burns...

"Save the research!"

achievements.description: The dead skin comes right off!
achievements.requirement: Spend too much time swimming in the boiling sea.

achievements.name: Rock Collector
achievements.description: Taimi's research might benefit from these.
achievements.requirement: Collect all the stray firestone shards.

bits.text: Savage Rise: In a cave behind the Rolling Devil nest.

Scalding Gorge: On a ledge high above, northwest of Sandstone Archway.

Titan's Throat: On the northeastern side, a little lower below the gate of fire.

Scalding Gorge: Hidden below Sandstone Archway, on the eastern side.
Scalding Gorge: On the underside of Sandstone Archway.
Rata Arcanum: Underneath a large firestone spire.

Wind Rider Ledge: Near the ceiling along the western wall.
Wind Rider Ledge: On the northern side, in a ceiling crevasse.
Wind Rider Ledge: High along the wall, southwest of Seething Pillar.
Wind Rider Ledge: Embedded high in a large palm tree.

Western Boiling Sea: Just below the Mastery insight.
Western Boiling Sea: Along a ledge northwest of Seething Pillar.
Western Boiling Sea: On a stone outcropping east of Seething Pillar.

Ancient Hollow: In a nook in a wall, north of a mushroom village.

Golemancer's Tomb: Embedded in the wall outside the tomb, high above Scout's Clearing.

Rata Arcanum: In a nook behind the Inquest's captive druid.
Rata Arcanum: Overlooking the Inquest's portal.

Rata Arcanum: In a nook near some soil in the caves behind Rata Arcanum.

Heathen's Hold: Above the entrance to Iota Vault.
Heathen's Hold: In the rocks on the wall north of Iota Vault.

Savage Rise: Near the base of a massive rocky pillar, southwest of the Peace Grounds.

Ancient Hollow: Toward the western edge of the land mass. Fireflies make their home nearby.

Mariner Landing: Atop a diagonal cliff face. Reef riders float nearby.

Mariner Landing: Near a thermal tube, south of Sub Landing.

achievements.name: Hungry Hal
achievements.description: An apple a day...
achievements.requirement: Find and feed this poor hungry soul on the island.

achievements.name: Task Master
achievements.description: Who's afraid of a little lava?
achievements.requirement: Finish all the tasks around Ember Bay.

bits.text: Win the favor of the circus

achievements.name: The Friendly Ghost
achievements.description: "It gets lonely here after the first hundred years...then you start thinking rocks are your friends. You are a sight for sore eyes. Thank you for keeping me company and reminding me of my humanity." —Captain Grumby
achievements.requirement: Bring Captain Grumby a few pieces of his ship to remind him of his home.

data.name: Captain Grumby's Ship Call Bell
data.description:
Double-click to gain karma.
This tattered old bell was given to you by Captain Grumby as a sign of your friendship.
<c=@flavor>"It's not much, but this was all I had left of my ship when I got stuck here. I want you to have it." —Captain Grumby</c>

achievements.name: Dominating the Dominator
achievements.description: It has destruction on its mind.
achievements.requirement: Slay the Molten Dominator near Burning Grotto.

achievements.name: Krackin' Karka
achievements.description: Karka thrive in this heat.
achievements.requirement: Slay the the champion karka near Ashen Skerries.

achievements.name: Queen of the Fire Islands
achievements.description: Heads will roll!
achievements.requirement: Knock some sense into the circus sloth near Performance Field.

achievements.name: Verm the Burnin' Wurm
achievements.description: "It's just a wurm that shoots fire. What could go wrong?"—Cami
achievements.requirement: Slay the lava wurm Vermingus near Fractured Caldera.

achievements.name: Return of the Jade Construct
achievements.description: What's a little magma between enemies?
achievements.requirement: Slay the pyroclastic jade construct near Caliph's Steps.

achievements.name: Broodmother Down by the Bay
achievements.description: "Kill it before someone gets eaten!"—Anonymous
achievements.requirement: Slay the drake broodmother southwest of Shipwreck Beach.

achievements.name: "Rising Flames" Mastery
achievements.description: If the volcano doesn't get you...
achievements.requirement: Complete all  "Rising Flames" achievements.

data.name: Dragonscale Epaulettes Box
data.description: Open to choose Dragonscale Epaulettes.

achievements.name: Skip up the Volcano
achievements.description: I'm melting...
achievements.requirement: Get to the top of the volcano.

achievements.name: Cami's Final Voyage
achievements.description: I wouldn't want to be in her shoes.
achievements.requirement: Collect Cami's journal entries around Ember Bay.

bits.text: Infernal Cape: look around the tip of the peninsula.
Shipwreck Beach: northwest of the cursed circus, buried in rocks after the beach labyrinth.
Bleeding Pulpit: located northeast of the bubbling caldera.
Lava Flats: Slipped under rock overhangs in the pool area.
Basalt Rise: below the largest rock outcrop east of the vista.
Sopor Titanum: Hidden directly west under the second staircase within the ruins.

data.name: Magic-Warped Packet
data.description: Contains basic crafting materials with a chance to get ascended materials.

achievements.name: Token Collector
achievements.description: Have you found all of them?
achievements.requirement: Collect all the mursaat tokens that were scattered around Ember Bay.

bits.text: Infernal Cape: On the eastern side of the volcano.
Burning Grotto: In the northern exit of the Furnace Chamber.
Burning Grotto: In the northern exit of the Furnace Chamber.
Burning Grotto: Hidden in a crevice in the back of the Furnace Chamber.
Smoldering Inlet: On the rocks northeast of the Magma Outlet.
Lava Flats: At the source of the Lava River.
Fractured Caldera: To the northeast of Quickk's Retreat.
Smoldering Inlet: Between rock shelfs in the mouth of the Magma Outlet.
Caliph's Steps: Under a rock shelf on the western beach.
Burning Grotto: Within the top shelf of the Furnace Chamber.
Smoldering Inlet: Near the peninsula in the inlet, within a small underwater cave.
Osprey Pillars: On the southwestern area, in the basaltic pillar underbelly.
Performance Field: look for a crack in the wall in the Sloth Queen's quarters.
Infernal Cape: Within a magma fall on the northwestern side of the volcano.
Fractured Caldera: On the upper rock-shelf tiers of the western side.
Infernal Cape: Under the volcano, hidden underwater.
Skritt Anchorage: At the highest point of the Dread Shiny.
Burning Grotto: Within the outer rock shelfs on the southern side.
Burning Grotto: Under the Furnace Chamber on the southeastern side.
Caliph's Steps: Next to the magma fall at the sealed entrance.
Bleeding Pulpit: Hiding in the north outer wall of the Pedestal of Flames.
Fractured Caldera: Along the riverbed of the magma outlet.
Sopor Titanum: Within the walls of the easternmost part of the volcano.
Sopor Titanum: Within the walls of the easternmost part of the volcano.
Sopor Titanum: Hidden within the outer walls of the inner magma falls on the north side of Chalice of Tears.
Shipwrecked Beach: On top of the highest rock spire next to Ivy's Circus Spectacular.
Infernal Cape: On the horns at the top of the volcano.
Shipwrecked Beach: Somewhere in someone's messy hut within Ivy's Circus Spectacular.
Sopor Titanum: Within the terrifying walls of the eastern side of the inner chamber.
Skritt Anchorage: Within the walls of Rock Face Scratch.
Sopor Titanum: Drop down the southern part toward Titan's Perch.
Caliph's Steps: On the third shelf up to the northwest of the Sealed Entrance.
Caliph's Steps: On an upper tier of a large room to the northeast of the Sealed Entrance.
Caliph's Steps: Look within some orifices on the Twin Skulls.
Burning Grotto: Under another rock shelf within the southeastern waters under the Furnace Chamber.
Burning Grotto: Hidden within the upper rock tier of Furnace Chamber on the eastern side.
Burning Grotto: Hidden within the outer rock walls of the Furnace Chamber to the northwest of the magma pool.
Caliph's Steps: Look within the rocks between the two Twin Skulls.
Bleeding Pulpit: Between the rocks where Destruction's Maw and Pedestal of Flames meet on the northern side.
Ashen Skerries: Look among the karka eggs in the Karka Hatchery.

data.name: Sentient Aberration
data.description: Double-click to feed 25 Dragonite Ore and 25 Empyreal Fragments to the Sentient Aberration. The aberration can devour a limited amount of materials each day.

achievements.name: Tablets of the Unseen
achievements.description: "The mursaat are an important piece of Tyrian history."—Magister Ela Makkay
achievements.requirement: Read the mursaat tablets scattered around their old fortress.

data.name: Magic-Warped Packet
data.description: Contains basic crafting materials with a chance to get ascended materials.

achievements.name: Ember Bay Insight: Ashen Skerries
achievements.requirement: Discover this Maguuma Mastery Insight in Ember Bay.

achievements.name: Ember Bay Insight: Caliph's Steps
achievements.requirement: Discover this Maguuma Mastery Insight in Ember Bay.

achievements.name: Walking on Fire
achievements.description: Don't look down!
achievements.requirement: Navigate the lava tunnel in Ember Bay.

achievements.name: Simulation Top Ten
achievements.description: Story Instance: Taimi's Game
achievements.requirement: Complete the Taimi's Game story instance without being defeated.

achievements.name: "A Bug in the System" Mastery
achievements.requirement: Complete all  "A Bug in the System" achievements.

data.name: Olmakhan Mantle Box
data.description: Open to choose an Olmakhan mantle.

achievements.name: Tracking the Scientist
achievements.description: Journal: Tracking the Scientist
achievements.requirement: Infiltrate a hidden Inquest facility and learn the location of Taimi's Inquest scientist.

achievements.name: Talk to the Fist
achievements.description: Story Instance: Tracking the Scientist
achievements.requirement: Be combative during questioning by Inquest guards.

achievements.name: I Make This Golem Look Good
achievements.description: Story Instance: Tracking the Scientist
achievements.requirement: Remain undetected while infiltrating the Inquest facility inside a golem.

achievements.name: Gate-Crasher
achievements.description: Story Instance: Tracking the Scientist
achievements.requirement: Reach the tracking network hub quickly, without provoking the Inquest.

achievements.name: The Test Subject
achievements.description: Journal: The Test Subject
achievements.requirement: Scour the lab for clues and make your escape.

achievements.name: A Kindness Repaid
achievements.description: Journal: A Kindness Repaid
achievements.requirement: Convince the Olmakhan Elders to join forces with you.

achievements.name: X-T3R-M1N-8
achievements.description: Story Instance: A Kindness Repaid
achievements.requirement: Defeat the Mark II Beta Exterminator Golem in under three minutes.

achievements.name: Cabbage Shredder
achievements.description: Story Instance: A Kindness Repaid
achievements.requirement: Arbitrarily ruin a perfectly good vegetable crop.

achievements.name: Impressionable Youth
achievements.description: Story Instance: A Kindness Repaid
achievements.requirement: Convince the cubs about the way they can best help their village.

achievements.name: The Road to Rata Primus
achievements.description: Journal: The Road to Rata Primus
achievements.requirement: Disable Rata Primus's communications tower and shield.

achievements.name: Stimulus and Response
achievements.description: Engage the brilliant test developed by the Inquest to study hive-mind abilities.
achievements.requirement: Solve the comms lab's hive-mind experiment in only 3 steps.

achievements.name: A Branded Blast
achievements.description: Brave yet another brilliant Inquest study of Kralkatorrik's minions.
achievements.requirement: Get hit by the captured Branded wyvern.

achievements.name: Faster Than Light
achievements.description: Engage in a test of intellect developed by the Inquest.
achievements.requirement: Activate the 4 door controls in the Invariant Enclave Lab in under 35 seconds.

achievements.name: The Charge
achievements.description: Journal: The Charge
achievements.requirement: Stop Joko's invasion and rescue Taimi's friends.

achievements.name: Inquest.Info
achievements.description: Story Instance: The Charge
achievements.requirement: Found all the classified Inquest data in Rata Primus.

achievements.name: Saving Skritt
achievements.description: Story Instance: The Charge
achievements.requirement: Find Subject S in the poisonous corridor and evacuate him to the airship.

achievements.name: Awake End
achievements.description: Story Instance: The Charge
achievements.requirement: Stop Commander Lonai from killing and Awakening any of the citizens of Divinity's Reach.

achievements.name: The Specimen Chamber
achievements.description: Inquest proposes. Commander disposes.
achievements.requirement: Defeat each champion simulacrum in the specimen chamber at least once.

bits.text: Simulacrum of Beyn, Scion of Thorns

achievements.name: Stormbreak
achievements.description: ...and everyone lived happily ever after.
achievements.requirement: Defeat the champion djinn in a cavern beneath the ruined paths.

achievements.name: The Queen and I
achievements.description: It's beetle battle time!
achievements.requirement: Slay the champion beetle queen near Driftwood Jetty.

achievements.name: Insuppressible
achievements.description: Don't take this nefarious Inquest construct lightly.
achievements.requirement: Defeat an Inquest suppressor golem at the facility around Rata Primus.

achievements.name: Wyvern Whacker
achievements.description: Dominate the dreadful Dominus.
achievements.requirement: Slay the champion Branded wyvern outside the Western Complex.

achievements.name: Three Golem Monte
achievements.description: Err...can I see that one more time?
achievements.requirement: Consecutively choose the correct golem in all rounds of the Golem Eye Exam event.

achievements.name: Tales of Elona
achievements.requirement: Listen to Ewyn's story at his retreat.

achievements.name: Magnetic Attraction
achievements.requirement: Collect all eight magneton particles floating in the Magnetics Lab.

achievements.name: Rescue Ranger
achievements.requirement: Rescue all skritt for Subject S on your way to the beach.

achievements.name: Honorary Olmakhan
achievements.requirement: Defeat each of the prestige hunting targets in the hunting grounds.

achievements.name: Sandswept Isles Bounty Hunter
achievements.requirement: Complete a bounty from each bounty board location.

achievements.name: Sandswept Isles Legendary Hunter
achievements.requirement: Defeat each legendary bounty in the Sandswept Isles at least once.

achievements.name: Sandswept Isles Champion Hunter
achievements.requirement: Defeat each champion bounty in the Sandswept Isles at least once.

achievements.name: Race to the Finish: Olmakhan Docks
achievements.requirement: Finish the race around the Olmakhan village docks in first, second, or third place.

achievements.name: Race to the Finish: Inquest Facility
achievements.requirement: Finish the race around the Inquest facility in first, second, or third place.

achievements.name: Track Record
achievements.requirement: Complete both races in the Sandswept Isles.

achievements.name: Crystal Corral: Gold
achievements.requirement: Quickly deliver data crystals to Defector Gliffu.

achievements.name: Crystal Corral: Silver
achievements.requirement: Quickly deliver data crystals to Defector Gliffu.

achievements.name: Sandswept Isles Griffon Expert: Silver

achievements.description: Golems are people too.
achievements.requirement: Acquire the parts to repair IG-6417.

achievements.name: Redeeming IG-6417
achievements.description: You are who you choose to be.
achievements.requirement: Upload recordings to teach IG-6417 how to be heroic.

bits.text: The Sunspear Creed: On a book stand.
Scriptures of Kormir: On a book stand.
Book of Secrets: On a book stand.
Journal: Top floor of the library. Requires discovering Untitled Volume before reading.
The Artist's Mirror: How Art Reflects Society: Found on the ground floor.
We, Too, Can Be Vessels of Knowledge and Truth: Found on the ground floor.
Poems by Danna, Age 9: Found on the top floor.
Magic and War: An Educated Warning: On a lower level, but only reachable by mount.
Journal of Kormir: Found in the hidden room.
Untitled Volume: Found in the hidden room.
Palace of Bones: The Centaur Tragedy: Found in the hidden room.
The Goddess and the Scourge: Found in the hidden room.
Turai's Story: Found in the hidden room.
The First City: Found in the hidden room.
Treacherous Waters: Found in the hidden room.
Speak with the Goddess of Truth and Knowledge.

achievements.requirement: Kill  crustaceans.

achievements.name: Devourer Slayer
achievements.description: Devourers may be ugly, tough, and dangerous, but they're still prey for a skilled adventurer.
achievements.requirement: Kill  devourers.

achievements.name: Dredge Slayer
achievements.description: Become the enemy of the collective by killing dredge.
achievements.requirement: Kill  dredge.

achievements.name: Elemental Slayer
achievements.description: Fire, earth, lightning, water, and ice can't stand up to steel and magic.
achievements.requirement: Kill  elementals.

achievements.name: Ettin Slayer
achievements.description: Just goes to show: two heads are not better than one.
achievements.requirement: Kill  ettins.

achievements.name: Ghost Buster
achievements.description: Send the spirits into the Mists so they can rest in peace.
achievements.requirement: Kill  ghosts.

achievements.name: Giant Slayer
achievements.description: The bigger they are, the harder they fall.
achievements.requirement: Kill  giants.

achievements.name: Grawl Slayer
achievements.description: They should have worshipped you. At least they'd still be alive.
achievements.requirement: Kill  grawl.

achievements.name: Griffon Slayer
achievements.description: Hunting these formidable beasts has been a Tyrian pastime for centuries.
achievements.requirement: Kill  griffons.

achievements.name: Hylek Slayer
achievements.description: Cull these aggressive amphibians.
achievements.requirement: Kill  hostile hylek.

achievements.name: Flame Legion's Bane
achievements.description: Smoke out Baelfire's minions, and show them what real power looks like.
achievements.requirement: Kill  members of the Flame Legion.

achievements.name: Fish Slayer
achievements.description: Gut the scaly swimmers to catch an achievement this big.
achievements.requirement: Kill  fish.

achievements.name: Imp Slayer
achievements.description: Don't worry. Demon blood is easy to wash out.
achievements.requirement: Kill  imps.

achievements.name: Inquest's Bane
achievements.description: If they are so smart, how come they couldn't stop from getting killed?
achievements.requirement: Kill  members of the Inquest.

achievements.name: Insect Slayer
achievements.description: Squish these creepy crawlies.
achievements.requirement: Kill  insects.

achievements.name: Jotun Slayer
achievements.description: These creatures used to be powerful and great kings. Now, dead.
achievements.requirement: Kill  jotun.

achievements.name: Krait Slayer
achievements.description: Make it safe to go back in the water.
achievements.requirement: Kill  krait.

achievements.name: Minotaur Slayer
achievements.description: Half-man, half-bull, all dead.
achievements.requirement: Kill  minotaurs.

achievements.name: Nightmare Court's Bane
achievements.description: Haunt these evil sylvari like a bad dream.
achievements.requirement: Kill  members of the Nightmare Court.

achievements.name: Ogre Slayer
achievements.description: Big and tough are only impressive if you're alive to show it off.
achievements.requirement: Kill  ogres.

achievements.name: Ooze Slayer
achievements.description: Hit them in the right spot and they make cool patterns in the mud.
achievements.requirement: Kill  oozes.

achievements.name: Pirate Slayer
achievements.description: The worst thing to happen to pirates since scurvy and sea monsters.
achievements.requirement: Kill  pirates.

achievements.name: Plant Slayer
achievements.description: These leafy monsters are now mulch.
achievements.requirement: Kill  plants.

achievements.name: Raptor Slayer
achievements.description: These birds of prey have met their predator.
achievements.requirement: Kill  raptors.

achievements.name: Skelk Slayer
achievements.description: These tricky hunters learned the hard way you were the most dangerous game.
achievements.requirement: Kill  skelk.

achievements.name: Skritt Slayer
achievements.description: Scrape these scavengers off the surface of Tyria.
achievements.requirement: Kill  skritt.

achievements.name: Sons of Svanir's Bane
achievements.description: The only good ice dragon cultist is a dead ice dragon cultist.
achievements.requirement: Kill  members of the Sons of Svanir.

achievements.name: Troll Slayer
achievements.description: Even trolls can't stand such brutal onslaughts.
achievements.requirement: Kill  trolls.

achievements.name: Wind Rider Slayer
achievements.description: Tangling with you was the last stupid decision these smart creatures ever made.
achievements.requirement: Kill  wind riders.

achievements.name: Wurm Slayer
achievements.description: Slice these slimy things from top to bottom.
achievements.requirement: Kill  wurms.

achievements.name: Zhaitan's Bane
achievements.description: Zhaitan should have raised a better army.
achievements.requirement: Kill  members of Zhaitan's army.

achievements.name: Reaper of the Awakened
achievements.description: They won't praise Joko after this!
achievements.requirement: Kill  members of Joko's Awakened.

achievements.name: Crystal Cracker
achievements.description: Purple is not your color.
achievements.requirement: Kill  members of the Branded army.

achievements.name: Elona Safari Hunter
achievements.description: Where the predators become the prey.
achievements.requirement: Kill  Crystal Desert predators.

achievements.name: Djinn Bottler
achievements.description: Wish them to oblivion.
achievements.requirement: Kill  djinn.

achievements.name: Slagger of the Forged
achievements.description: It's important to recycle!
achievements.requirement: Kill  members of Balthazar's Forged.

achievements.name: The Shatterer
achievements.requirement: The Shatterer Achievements Complete: /

data.name: Branded Backpiece
data.description:
"Bash the dragon, smash the dragon, may it never rise up again!"
—Excerpt from "Bash the Dragon"

achievements.name: Burns Blunder
achievements.description: Incoming!
achievements.requirement: Stand in the wrong place when the Shatterer Lands.

achievements.name: Branded Bane
achievements.description: Crystallized corpses as far as the eye can see!
achievements.requirement: Kill  Branded during the Shatterer battle.

achievements.name: No-Fly Zone
achievements.description: Get down here; we're not done with you!
achievements.requirement: Break the Shatterer's defiance bar  time, preventing its Shard Storm attack.

achievements.name: Crystal Clear
achievements.description: Break them before they break you!
achievements.requirement: Break  people out of crystal prisons created by the Shatterer.

achievements.name: Lightning Reflexes
achievements.description: Faster than greased lightning!
achievements.requirement: Dodge the Shatterer's Focused Lightning Attack  time while gliding.

achievements.name: Crystal Healing Denier
achievements.description: Healing crystals? Sounds like a scam...
achievements.requirement: Destroy  pulsating crystal node during the Shatterer battle.

achievements.name: Shattering Evasion
achievements.description: Dodge!
achievements.requirement: Defeat the Shatterer without ever being imprisoned in a crystal.

achievements.name: Shattering Setup
achievements.description: BOOM!
achievements.requirement: Use the mortar, turret, and jump pad at Lowland Burns during the Shatterer fight.

achievements.name: Medic!
achievements.description: The only time it's wise to run toward the sound of mortars.
achievements.requirement: Provide med kits to your allies using the mortars or the glider bomber kit.

achievements.name: Bash the Dragon
achievements.requirement: Defeat the Shatterer.

achievements.name: Smash the Dragon
achievements.description: Shattered wings.
achievements.requirement: Complete the fight without the Shatterer ever taking off and using Shard Storm.

achievements.name: Krytan Explorer
achievements.description: You've explored the war-torn hills of humanity's home.
achievements.requirement: Explore all areas in Kryta.

bits.text: Harathi Hinterlands: Ruins of Holy Demetra

achievements.name: Orr Explorer
achievements.description: You've explored the land once doomed to the ocean by Vizier Khilbron.
achievements.requirement: Explore all areas in Orr.

achievements.name: Maguuma Explorer
achievements.description: You've explored the lush region that cradles the sylvari and provides refuge to the asura.
achievements.requirement: Explore all areas in Maguuma.

bits.text: Caledon Forest: Ruins of the Unseen
Rata Sum: Rata Sum Port Authority
The Grove: The Sea Rider's Gate

achievements.name: Shiverpeak Explorer

achievements.requirement: Explore all areas in the Shiverpeaks.

bits.text: Frostgorge Sound: The Sea of Lamentation
Snowden Drifts: Song of Final Exile
Timberline Falls: Tail of the Serpent
Timberline Falls: Lair of the Coil

achievements.name: Ascalon Explorer
achievements.description: You've explored the ancestral territory of the charr.
achievements.requirement: Explore all areas in Ascalon.

achievements.name: Dive Master
achievements.description: Leave no tides unchallenged.
achievements.requirement: Find and use  diving locations.

achievements.name: Legendary Collector
achievements.description: Owner of some of the rarest items in Tyria.
achievements.requirement: Soulbind  unique Legendary item.

achievements.name: Windy Cave Treasure
achievements.description: Bring a jacket. It's breezy.
achievements.requirement: Find the treasure of the Windy Cave.

achievements.name: Tears of Itlaocol
achievements.description: Sadness, or joy?
achievements.requirement: Solve the puzzle of Itlaocol.

achievements.name: Don't Touch the Shiny
achievements.description: You touched the shiny, didn't you?
achievements.requirement: Offend the skritt in the Ruins of the Unseen.

achievements.name: Forsaken Fortune
achievements.description: Delving into darkness.
achievements.requirement: Discover the hidden riches of Forsaken Halls.

achievements.name: Vexa's Lab
achievements.description: Breach the lab's security. Breach it good.
achievements.requirement: Find the center of Vexa's Lab.

achievements.name: Magellan's Memento
achievements.description: Some prayers go unanswered.
achievements.requirement: Uncover the riches that doomed Francis Magellan.

achievements.name: The Long Way Around
achievements.description: Fryxx will know if you take the short way around.
achievements.requirement: Find a way to reach Fryxx.

achievements.name: Ship of Sorrows
achievements.description: Straits within straits.
achievements.requirement: Seek lost riches off Orr's shores.

achievements.name: Beaker's Empty Belly
achievements.description: Better than empty Beaker's belly.
achievements.requirement: Ease Beaker's appetite.

achievements.name: Forgotten Stream
achievements.description: Seriously, who put a door here?
achievements.requirement: Locate the stream deep beneath Orr.

achievements.name: Grounded
achievements.description: It's more of a dirge than an anthem, really.
achievements.requirement: Recover lost valuables within a beached ship.

achievements.name: Goff's Loot
achievements.description: Finders keepers.
achievements.requirement: Find Goff's loot.

achievements.name: Rebel's Seclusion
achievements.description: It isn't grave robbing if they fight back, right?
achievements.requirement: Explore Rebel's Seclusion.

achievements.name: Bad Neighborhood
achievements.description: Plug your nose and grab the goods.
achievements.requirement: Infiltrate the bandit's hideout.

achievements.name: Speedy Reader
achievements.description: Broken into twenty volumes for easy reading!
achievements.requirement: Read the complete history of the founding of Ebonhawke in one day.

achievements.name: Cleaning Up the Neighborhood
achievements.description: Professional propaganda poster purger.
achievements.requirement: Tore down all of the Separatist propaganda posters in one day.

achievements.name: Jackaloping Along
achievements.description: Hop a mile in a jackalope's horns.
achievements.requirement: Get transformed into a jackalope by the Skritt Burglar.

achievements.name: Behind the Mask
achievements.description: Wander around in raccoon form.
achievements.requirement: Get transformed into a raccoon by the Skritt Burglar.

achievements.name: Chicken Scramble
achievements.description: Experience a real bird's-eye view.
achievements.requirement: Get transformed into a chicken by the Skritt Burglar.

achievements.name: A Waddle to Remember
achievements.description: Shake things up as a baby siamoth.
achievements.requirement: Get transformed into a baby siamoth by the Skritt Burglar.

achievements.name: History Buff
achievements.description: Find the plaques around Tyria about Cobiah Marriner's life.

data.name: Sea of Sorrows
data.description: Double-click to gain five spirit shards.

achievements.name: Twice-Told Legend
achievements.description: Some legends are so great, they must be experienced twice.

achievements.name: Finish What You Started
achievements.requirement: Successfully complete all five Breaking the Ice events in Frostgorge Sound.

bits.text: Drive the Sons of Svanir from Coiled Watch.
Escort the explosives-laden dolyaks to the Barrowstead.
Destroy the totem foci to stop the Svanir corruption ritual.

achievements.name: Not on My Watch
achievements.requirement: Capture and defend Coiled Watch in Frostgorge Sound without any casualties.

achievements.name: Boomyaks
achievements.requirement: Keep all explosives-laden dolyaks alive on the trip to Barrowstead's gate in Frostgorge Sound.

achievements.name: Mordrem Problems
achievements.requirement: Successfully complete all five Mordrem events in Iron Marches.

bits.text: Defeat the Gravelash and its cluster of tendrils.
Gather Mordrem samples from the vine chambers.

achievements.name: Bottoms Up
achievements.requirement: Drink nectars dropped by the Mordrem champion in Iron Marches to nullify its poisons.

achievements.name: Toxicity Trampler
achievements.requirement: Defeat the Mordrem champion in Iron Marches without being poisoned.

achievements.name: Lion's Arch Exterminator
achievements.requirement: Find Turl Sharptooth in the Commodore's Quarter, and use one of his special rifles to deal with the karka hatchling infestation.

data.name: Princess
data.description:
Double-click to feed 50 dragonite ore in exchange for a gift. Princess will become full if fed too much dragonite in a day.
There's something charming about the way she chitters.

achievements.name: Glutton for Guidance
achievements.description: You received some career advice, and you ate it up.
achievements.requirement: Take in the employment pamphlet dispensed by Hero-Tron in Lion's Arch.

achievements.name: Verdant Brink Explorer
achievements.requirement: Explore all areas in Verdant Brink.

achievements.name: Auric Basin Explorer
achievements.requirement: Explore all areas in Auric Basin.

achievements.name: Tangled Depths Explorer
achievements.requirement: Explore all areas in Tangled Depths.

achievements.name: Dragon's Stand Explorer
achievements.requirement: Explore all areas in Dragon's Stand.

achievements.name: Spirit of the Tiger
achievements.description: Find the lost tiger dens throughout Tyria.

data.name: Mini Tiger Spirit
data.description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

achievements.name: Legendary Armorer
achievements.description: Owner of some of the rarest items in Tyria.
achievements.requirement: Soulbind  unique legendary armor piece.

achievements.name: Llama Roundup
achievements.description: Looking for llamas in all the wrong places.
achievements.requirement: Find  lost llamas in the PvP Lobby.

achievements.name: Desert Highlands Explorer
achievements.description: You've explored the rocky hills and windswept basins of the Desert Highlands.
achievements.requirement: Explore all areas in Desert Highlands.

achievements.name: Crystal Oasis Explorer
achievements.description: You've explored the lush croplands and drifting sands of Crystal Oasis.
achievements.requirement: Explore all areas of Crystal Oasis.

achievements.name: Domain of Vabbi Explorer
achievements.description: You've explored the fabled opulence of the Domain of Vabbi.
achievements.requirement: Explore all the areas in the Domain of Vabbi.

achievements.name: Elon Riverlands Explorer
achievements.description: You've explored the abundant countryside and rolling dunes of the Elon Riverlands.
achievements.requirement: Explore all the areas in Elon Riverlands.

achievements.name: Desolation Explorer
achievements.description: You've explored the treacherous and bleak landscape known as the Desolation.
achievements.requirement: Explore all areas in the Desolation.

achievements.name: Local Hero
achievements.description: A true hero takes time from slaying dragons to help out the common folk as well.
achievements.requirement: Complete  renown hearts.

achievements.name: Emergency Response Hero
achievements.description: Always willing to lend a hand, or sword, for the common good. You go where the action is.
achievements.requirement: Participate in  events.

achievements.name: Been There, Done That
achievements.description: Seeking Zhaitan's corruption in every corner of Tyria.
achievements.requirement: Map-complete all locations in Tyria.

achievements.name: Crime and Punishment
achievements.description: Through valor and a thirst for justice, you earned Logan Thackeray's trust.
achievements.requirement: Complete the human personal story step "Breaking the Blade," "The Commander," or "The Trial of Julius Zamon."

achievements.name: Family Reunion
achievements.description: You dealt with your past, and now you may join the world moving forward.
achievements.requirement: Complete the human personal story step "Ashes of the Past," "Liberation," or "The Ringmaster."

achievements.name: Storming the Castle
achievements.description: You saved Queen Jennah from an insidious plot.
achievements.requirement: Complete the human personal story step "Kellach's Attack," "The Queen's Justice," or "The Trap."

achievements.name: For the Legion!
achievements.description: You brought heat to the Flame Legion.
achievements.requirement: Complete the charr personal story step "Deadly Force," "Ghostbore Artillery," "Operation: Bulwark," or "Quick and Quiet."

achievements.name: Bloodying the Past
achievements.description: You have faced down the past, proving once again your might and wits.
achievements.requirement: Complete the charr personal story step "Dishonorable Discharge," "In the Ruins," "Sins of the Father," "Thicker Than Water," or "Tribunes in Effigy."

achievements.name: From Howl to Silence
achievements.description: Your honor is restored. However, you must prepare for a greater danger.
achievements.requirement: Complete the charr personal story step "Ever Vigilant," "Research and Destroy," or "Whispers of Vengeance."

achievements.name: Waking from the Nightmare
achievements.description: You were awakened in the Dream and beat back the nightmare threat.
achievements.requirement: Complete the sylvari personal story step "Beneath a Cold Moon," "Black Night, White Stag," "The Heart of Nightmare," or "The Knight's Duel."

achievements.name: A Season of Growth
achievements.description: Some victories are bittersweet, but they're victories nonetheless.
achievements.requirement: Complete the sylvari personal story step "A Vision of Darkness," "Eye of the Sun," "Shattered Light," or "Snuffing Out Embers."

achievements.name: Branching Out
achievements.description: You made sure the dead stayed dead.
achievements.requirement: Complete the sylvari personal story step "A Tangle of Weeds," "Dead of Winter," or "Flower of Death."

achievements.name: Rising to the Challenge
achievements.description: Today, you proved your strength by stopping a threat to the lodge.
achievements.requirement: Complete the norn personal story step "Minotaur Rampant," "The Last of the Giant-Kings," or "The Wolf Havroun."

achievements.name: Things Best Left Behind
achievements.description: You cleaved an embarrassment from your past.
achievements.requirement: Complete the norn personal story step "Preserving the Balance," "The Championship Fight," or "The Machine in Action."

achievements.name: Brawn over Brains
achievements.description: You destroyed the Dredge weapon and brought a fellow norn back on the path of destiny.
achievements.requirement: Complete the norn personal story step "Assault the Hill," "Sever the Head," or "Silent Warfare."

achievements.name: Graduation Day
achievements.description: Your brains and brawn were tested, and you stopped an Inquest plot.
achievements.requirement: Complete the asura personal story step "Gadd's Last Gizmo," "Defusing the Problem," "Here, There, Everywhere," or "The Things We Do For Love."

achievements.name: Legacy Code
achievements.description: Your quick thinking and actions stopped an error in your past from causing disaster in the present.
achievements.requirement: Complete the asura personal story step "Flash Flood," "Magnum Opus," or "Split Second."

achievements.name: Something Lost, Something Gained
achievements.description: Despite a setback, you find yourself ready to embark on a larger adventure.
achievements.requirement: Complete the asura personal story step "A Meeting of the Minds," "Lines of Communication," or "Rakt and Ruin."

achievements.name: Defending History, Informing the Future
achievements.description: You are now a full member of the Durmand Priory.
achievements.requirement: Complete the personal story step "Mightier than the Sword."

achievements.name: Some Must Fight, That All May Be Free
achievements.description: You have become a full member of the Vigil.
achievements.requirement: Complete the story step "Minister's Defense" or "Quaestor's Siege."

achievements.name: To Know the Unknown
achievements.description: You are now a full member of the Order of Whispers.
achievements.requirement: Complete the personal story step "An Apple a Day."

achievements.name: A Friend In Deed
achievements.description: You came to the aid of another race under threat by the dragons.
achievements.requirement: Complete the story step "Attempted Deicide," "Evacuation," "Set to Blow," "The Lost Chieftain's Return," or "Unholy Grounds."

achievements.name: This Far, No Further
achievements.description: You liberated Claw Island from the undead and swore to strike back at the heart of Orr.
achievements.requirement: Complete the personal story step "Retribution."

achievements.name: The Cost of Victory
achievements.description: You faced your worst fear and emerged triumphant.
achievements.requirement: Complete the personal story step "A Sad Duty," "Delivering Justice," or "Liberating Apatia."

achievements.name: Savior of Tyria
achievements.description: You are counted among the great heroes of Tyria.
achievements.requirement: Complete the personal story step "Victory or Death."

achievements.name: Dungeons Discovered
achievements.description: Chasing evil out of the dark places where it hides.
achievements.requirement: Complete 8 dungeon stories.

bits.text: The Ruined City of Arah Story

achievements.name: Lifetime Survivor
achievements.description: Only mostly unkillable.
achievements.requirement: Gain  experience without dying or changing maps.

achievements.name: Birthday—Year 1
achievements.description: You have a character that is more than 1 year old.

achievements.name: Birthday—Year 2
achievements.description: You have a character that is more than 2 years old.

achievements.name: Birthday—Year 3
achievements.description: You have a character that is more than 3 years old.

data.name: Permanent Birthday Finisher
data.description: Obliterate your foes with this mystical sword finishing move in PvP and WvW.

achievements.name: Birthday—Year 4
achievements.description: You have a character that is more than 4 years old.

data.name: Anniversary Backpack and Mail Carrier Pack
data.description: Double-click to choose an exclusive city-themed backpack and receive an anniversary mail carrier.

achievements.name: Birthday—Year 5
achievements.description: You have a character that is more than 5 years old.

data.name: Anniversary Backpack and Weapon Pack Combo
data.description: Double-click to gain one Anniversary Backpack Pack and two Anniversary Weapon Packs.

achievements.name: Master of Heroics
achievements.description: Joining the ranks of Tyria's greatest heroes.
achievements.requirement: Reach level 80 with one character on your account.

achievements.name: Dungeon Master
achievements.description: Mastering the deepest secrets of the darkest corners.
achievements.requirement: Complete  explorable dungeons.

achievements.name: Hobby Dungeon Explorer
achievements.description: You return to the depths for adventure's sake.
achievements.requirement: Complete  explorable dungeons.

achievements.name: Catacombs Conqueror
achievements.description: Graveling groveling gravelings.
achievements.requirement: Explored Ascalonian Catacombs.

achievements.name: Master of Arah
achievements.description: Favorite hangout of Giganticus Lupicus.
achievements.requirement: Explored Ruined City of Arah.

achievements.name: Manor Magnate
achievements.description: Beetlestone's bane.
achievements.requirement: Explored Caudecus's Manor.

achievements.name: Sorrow's Subjugator
achievements.description: The mighty moletariat unites in deed and song!
achievements.requirement: Explored Sorrow's Embrace.

achievements.name: Twilight's Idol
achievements.description: Getting to the root of the problem.
achievements.requirement: Explored Twilight Arbor.

achievements.name: Sanctuary Savior
achievements.description: Floating glacier city, dead ahead.
achievements.requirement: Explored Honor of the Waves.

achievements.name: Citadel of Flame Foe
achievements.description: Trouble in Baelfire's wake.
achievements.requirement: Explored the Citadel of Flame.

achievements.name: Eternity's Epitome
achievements.description: Just how many Subject Alphas are there?
achievements.requirement: Explored the Crucible of Eternity.

achievements.name: Dungeon Frequenter
achievements.description: Delving into all the dungeons.
achievements.requirement: Complete eight dungeon paths for a grand reward!

data.name: Chest of Dungeoneering
data.description: Double-click to open. Contains a choice of 150 tokens from any dungeon.

achievements.name: Triple Trouble
achievements.requirement: Complete  great jungle wurm achievement in Bloodtide Coast.

achievements.name: Wurm Decapitator
achievements.requirement: Decapitate  head of the great jungle wurm in Bloodtide Coast.

achievements.name: Wurm Egg Scrambler
achievements.requirement: Kill  great jungle wurm egg before the larvae hatch.

achievements.name: Wurm Bait
achievements.requirement: Slather yourself in wurm attractant while escorting the Vigil crusader.

achievements.name: Phytotoxin Enthusiast
achievements.requirement: Expose yourself to phytotoxins while escorting the Vigil crusader.

achievements.name: Wurm Kleptomaniac

data.description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

achievements.name: Cleaned Your Clockheart
achievements.description: Let's see if the Aetherblades can work in the dark.
achievements.requirement: Destroy the Aetherblade hideout power source.

achievements.requirement: Defeat Foreman Spur in the Twilight Assault dungeon.

achievements.description: Forget the minions; talk to the manager.

achievements.description: Do not play with fire unless it's necessary.

achievements.name: True Friend to Turma
achievements.description: You don't have to be a guardian to be a guardian angel.

achievements.name: Unshippable
achievements.description: The skies should be more friendly now.

—LOR-748 Field Reporter
achievements.requirement: Defeat a legendary karka queen on Southsun Cove.

achievements.name: Defender: Blue Oasis
achievements.requirement: Successfully defend Blue Oasis from the Mordrem after the Pact forces holding the fort have achieved level 3 defenses.

achievements.name: Silverwastes Shoveler
achievements.requirement: Use a Silverwastes shovel to uncover a lost bandit chest in the Silverwastes.

achievements.requirement: Collect key fragments from lesser nightmare pods, and unlock the greater nightmare pod while the Hidden Depths is dark.

achievements.name: Mercantile Mercenary
achievements.requirement: Donate bandit crests to the mercenary requisitioner at Camp Resolve in the Silverwastes.

achievements.name: Retrospective Runaround
achievements.description: Uncover the secrets of Sand Dune Caverns.
achievements.requirement: Complete the jumping puzzle.

data.name: Endless Skritt Burglar Tonic
data.description: Double-click to transform for 15 minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

achievements.name: Vinewrath Vanquisher
achievements.requirement: Defeat the Mordrem Vinewrath.

data.name: Carapace Coat Box
data.description: Double-click to choose a piece of light, medium, or heavy armor.

achievements.name: Devourer Protector
achievements.requirement: Defend the devourer siege carrier during the assault on the Mordrem Vinewrath.

achievements.name: Golem Protector
achievements.requirement: Defend the golem siege carrier during the assault on the Mordrem Vinewrath.

achievements.name: Arboreal Protector
achievements.requirement: Defend the arboreal siege carrier during the assault on the Mordrem Vinewrath.

achievements.name: Beekeeper Crusher
achievements.requirement: Defeat the Mordrem Vinewrath's champion, the Mordrem Beekeeper.

achievements.name: Mangler Wrangler
achievements.requirement: Defeat the Mordrem Vinewrath's champion, the Mordrem Mangler.

achievements.name: Dark Wing Defoliator
achievements.requirement: Defeat the Mordrem Vinewrath's champion, the Mordrem Dark Wing.

achievements.name: Covered in Bees!
achievements.requirement: Use a honeycomb to avoid taking damage from the Mordrem Vinewrath's beam while fighting the Mordrem Beekeeper.

achievements.name: Don't Look Now
achievements.requirement: Stand in the correct location to avoid being mesmerized by the Mordrem Vinewrath while fighting the Mordrem Mangler.

achievements.name: Jump Up to Get Down
achievements.requirement: Use plant debris to avoid taking damage from the Mordrem Vinewrath's uproot attack while fighting the Mordrem Dark Wing.

achievements.name: Dive Master: Drydock Scratch
achievements.requirement: Find and use a diving location in Drydock Scratch.

achievements.name: Ambassador's Aid
achievements.requirement: Assist Ambassador Ikkhit'ch by defending the skritt territory from bandit raiders.

data.name: Boot Requisition Order
data.description: Grants the ability to purchase Carapace boot boxes from bandit crest collectors.

achievements.name: Hit and Run
achievements.requirement: Use a rock to knock a crystal shard out of Inquest hands while racing them to collect crystal shards for the Zephyrites.

achievements.name: Legendary Llama Locator

achievements.name: Buried Treasure: Prospect Valley
achievements.requirement: Find and open  buried locked chest in Prospect Valley.

achievements.requirement: Catch a chicken out of the dust mite twister. Active during the sandstorm at tier 3 or greater.

achievements.name: Ruler of Shinies
achievements.requirement: Defeat Queen Chrii'kkt IV. Active during the sandstorm at tier 4 or greater.

achievements.name: Learned Legendary Llama Locator
achievements.description: The llama's legend lingers!
achievements.requirement: Find the legendary llama hidden in the uplands of Dry Top.

achievements.name: Buried Treasure: Uplands
achievements.requirement: Find and open  buried locked chest in the Treadrock Uplands, Uplands Oasis, or Unswept Uplands.

achievements.requirement: Survive for a minimum of 15 seconds while standing in the quicksand river around Prosperity.

achievements.requirement: Find all of the lost coins hidden around Treadrock Uplands, Uplands Oasis, and Unswept Uplands.

achievements.requirement: Discover Shadows provisions spread throughout the Desolation.

achievements.description: The miners of Acrid Springs are long gone, but old coins still litter the ruined worksite.
achievements.requirement: Recover sulfur-worn coins from the ruins of Acrid Springs.

achievements.requirement: Gather documents for Order of Shadows agents before time runs out!

achievements.requirement: Gather documents for Order of Shadows agents before time runs out!

achievements.requirement: Test Creator Jadi's experimental sulfur shooter by using it on, and then killing, a variety of sulfur-damaged Forged.

achievements.name: Joko's Hidden Chamber
achievements.description: Joko has sealed away an important part of his kingdom beneath the shattered ravines near the Bone Palace.
achievements.requirement: Gain entry to Joko's hidden chamber.

achievements.requirement: Defeat each Champion bounty in the Desolation at least once.

achievements.requirement: Now that you have your jackal, you can gain tasty treats for it as a reward for helping locals.

achievements.name: The Throne of Bones
achievements.description: Palawa Joko's throne of bones lies deep within the Bone Palace. His builders aren't very creative...
achievements.requirement: Sit on Palawa Joko's throne.

achievements.name: Path of the Gods
achievements.description: There WOULD be eight, but nobody could find any statues of Dhuum.
achievements.requirement: Kneel at the statues of each human god.

achievements.name: Dance Till You Drop
achievements.description: One of the last remaining vestiges of Abaddon's power is his abiding hatred of dance.

achievements.name: A Soaring Stench
achievements.description: A fine ride with a not-so-fine smell.
achievements.requirement: Soar through Caustic Spur to reach the overlook cache.

achievements.name: Bone Palace Pinnacle
achievements.description: From the top of the Bone Palace, Joko can keep an eye on all of the Desolation.
achievements.requirement: Climb to the top of the Bone Palace.

achievements.name: Honoring the Fallen
achievements.requirement: Bow at Sandstrewn Shrine to summon First Spear Dehvad, and collect medals from him for completing his tasks.

data.name: Mini First Spear Dehvad
data.description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

achievements.name: Renowned Adventurer: The Desolation
achievements.requirement: Complete all of the renown hearts located in the Desolation.

bits.text: Help Drojkor, Spirit Squall, control jackals.
Help Kisha Odili keep the village running.
Help the Order of Shadows defend against the Forged.

achievements.name: A Redeemer's Friend
achievements.description: The Order of Shadows has a greater plan for Redeemer Kossan—a position that only he can fill.
achievements.requirement: After completing successful patrols with Redeemer Kossan, speak with him again once he's talked to Keeper Pamir.

achievements.name: Shadow Patroller
achievements.description: Redeemer Kossan—a descendant of Sunspears Koss and Melonni—launches patrols from Torment's Watch, the Order of Shadows camp.
achievements.requirement: Help Redeemer Kossan search for Forged activity by successfully patrolling the Ruination.

achievements.name: Realm-Portal Spiker
achievements.description: The Forged open realm portals at Maws within the Ruptured Heart to get reinforcement squads. The residue from emerging units can be combined with portal spikes to damage the realm portals.
achievements.requirement: Plant 100 portal spikes into the realm portals at the Ruptured Heart.

achievements.name: Shadow Sprinter
achievements.description: Shadows handlers collect intel reports and use them to evaluate enemy and ally positions, then they pass their revised orders to Shadows watchers who distribute the new field orders to agents.
achievements.requirement: Earn Order of Shadows seals by successfully completing events and lending assistance to agents throughout the Ruptured Heart and the Desolation.

achievements.name: Shadow of a Shadow
achievements.description: To earn this title, one must prove their commitment to freeing Elona by aiding the Order of Shadows.
achievements.requirement: Complete all six Order of Shadows achievements.

achievements.name: Full Rebel Assault
achievements.requirement: Save all four captive villagers from execution at Bonestrand Garrison, and ensure they survive to face their enemy.

achievements.name: Junundu Whisperer
achievements.description: If you successfully lure in three junundu, the whole clew will arrive.
achievements.requirement: Keep the six junundu alive while destroying all of the siege engines in the Shattered Ravines.

achievements.name: A Family's Sacrifice
achievements.description: Countless families have been torn apart by Joko's rule. He took their hope, but now you've returned it.
achievements.requirement: Tell Tiba about her father's death, and locate her sister.

achievements.name: Cleansing Tormented Remnants
achievements.description: Generations have passed since Abaddon was defeated, but his tormented energies remain.
achievements.requirement: Use your jackal to clear tormented remnants from the Poisoned Outcrops and Helcoid Seeps.

achievements.name: Race to the Finish: the Desolation
achievements.requirement: Finish the race around Sand Jackal Run in first, second, or third place.

achievements.description: You help where you're needed.
achievements.requirement: Complete events in the Crystal Desert region.

achievements.name: Crystal Desert Explorer
achievements.description: You've explored all major areas of the Crystal Desert.
achievements.requirement: Explore all areas in the Crystal Desert.

bits.text: Explore all areas in Crystal Oasis.
Explore all areas in the Desert Highlands.
Explore all areas in the Elon Riverlands.
Explore all areas in the Desolation.
Explore all areas in the Domain of Vabbi.

achievements.name: Dune Rider
achievements.requirement: Unlock the raptor mount by completing the Seeker's Village task region in Crystal Oasis, and by purchasing a raptor saddle from Aksim.

achievements.name: Fleet of Foot
achievements.requirement: Unlock the springer mount by completing the Highjump Ranch task region in the Desert Highlands, and by purchasing a springer saddle from Unja.

achievements.name: Skimming the Surface
achievements.requirement: Unlock the skimmer by completing the Skimmer Ranch task region in the Elon Riverlands and purchasing a skimmer saddle from Ardra.

achievements.name: Desert Dogs
achievements.requirement: Unlock the jackal mount by completing the Djinn Enclave task region in the Desolation, and by purchasing a jackal saddle from Drojkor.

achievements.name: Open Skies: On Wings and a Prayer
achievements.description: Come, hero, and reclaim the skies for the Sunspears. For us, reclaim Elona.
achievements.requirement: Return the Writings of the Last Spearmarshal to the pedestal in the sanctuary.

bits.text: Collect all 10 volumes of the Writings of the Last Spearmarshal from Kormir's sanctum.
Place the Writings of the Last Spearmarshal on the pedestal in the Sunspear sanctuary.

achievements.name: Open Skies: Sunspear Sanctuary
achievements.requirement: Gather Sunspear relics from all 5 maps and restore them to the Sunspear sanctuary.

bits.text: Collect the Sunspear relics from Desert Highlands.
Collect the Sunspear relics from Crystal Oasis.
Collect the Sunspear relics from Elon Riverlands.
Collect the Sunspear relics from the Desolation.
Collect the Sunspear relics from the Domain of Vabbi.
Place the griffon eggs in their respective nests.
Set the Sunspear runes in their respective places around the Sunspear crest.

data.name: Divine Passage
data.description: By rebuilding the sanctuary, you will be granted access to Kormir's sanctum.

achievements.name: Elon Riverlands Bounty Tour
achievements.requirement: Complete a bounty from each bounty board location.

achievements.name: Elon Riverlands Champion Bounties
achievements.requirement: Defeat each Champion bounty in the Elon Riverlands at least once.

achievements.name: Elon Riverlands Legendary Bounties
achievements.requirement: Defeat each Legendary bounty in the Elon Riverlands at least once.

achievements.name: Augury Ascended
achievements.description: Does this count as Ascension?
achievements.requirement: Reach the pinnacle of Augury Rock.

achievements.name: Flameseeker Prophecies
achievements.description: Glint foretold the Fall of Orr, the Searing of Ascalon, the rise of the White Mantle, and the defeat of the Unseen Ones.
achievements.requirement: Discover and decrypt verses of the Flameseeker Prophecies within Augury Rock.

achievements.name: Lost Lore of Elon Riverlands
achievements.requirement: Collect all pages to complete the book.

data.name: The Legacy
data.description: With all of the pages together, the worn text is now legible.

achievements.name: Forgotten Debris
achievements.requirement: Discover Forgotten debris spread throughout the Elon Riverlands.

achievements.name: Skimmer Search
achievements.requirement: Use your newly earned skimmer to help those in need throughout the Elon Riverlands.

achievements.name: Skimshallow Cove Supply Run: Silver
achievements.requirement: Gather supplies for the ranch hands of Skimmer Ranch quickly!

achievements.name: Skimshallow Cove Supply Run: Gold
achievements.requirement: Gather supplies for the ranch hands of Skimmer Ranch quickly!

achievements.name: Elon River Dive Master
achievements.requirement: Use diving goggles at the various diving locations across the Elon Riverlands.

achievements.name: Equipment Tracker
achievements.requirement: Find and return Master Sergeant Shadi's lost equipment.

data.name: Mini Master Sergeant Shadi
data.description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

achievements.name: Descension
achievements.description: For many Ascension seekers, the end of their journey was not what they expected.
achievements.requirement: Explore the Cave of the Lost and defeat Second Spear Binah.

achievements.name: Mysteries of the Exalted
achievements.requirement: Solve the Exalted puzzle.

achievements.name: Magic Hunter
achievements.requirement: Collect data from unstable magic nodes by moving through them.

achievements.name: Renowned Adventurer: Elon Riverlands
achievements.requirement: Complete all of the renown hearts in the Elon Riverlands.

bits.text: Help Adisa collect Slivers of Vlast from veteran Branded.
Help Follower Xunn collect Forgotten Glyphs for decoding.
Help Follower Dawnwynn defeat Branded Forgotten at Augury Rock.
Help Assistant Foreman Kofi keep the people of the Gladefields safe.
Help Ebele prepare the way north for defectors.
Use a skimmer to help with training around the ranch.

achievements.name: Flowers for Jimoh
achievements.description: Jimoh's family was torn when her husband Iweh spoke against Joko. She is looking for some peace in the aftermath.
achievements.requirement: Help Jimoh find comfort by reaching out to her family.

achievements.name: Defector Protector
achievements.description: Oasis camps in the Riverlands form a secret network for exiles fleeing Joko's kingdom for Amnoon.
achievements.requirement: Convince all ten restless exiles to leave the Arid Gladefields for the same trip, and ensure all defectors reach the oasis camp to the north.

achievements.name: Ghostly Trio
achievements.description: Centuries ago, three heroes guided the Chosen through the Trials of Ascension. When Augury Rock is compromised, they will journey to the Throne of Pellentia to meet their leader, Turai Ossa.
achievements.requirement: Follow the three ghostly heroes through each step of their return path, and meet their leader.

achievements.name: Prison Breaker
achievements.description: Villagers who don't meet their farming quotas are taken to the Deadhouse, where Warden Jabari turns them into Awakened.
achievements.requirement: In a single prison break, destroy all of the cell doors to free villagers and defeat Warden Jabari to free Emara.

achievements.name: Frequent Forgotten Teleporter
achievements.description: Forgotten teleporters have been in the Crystal Desert for centuries, aiding adventurers' travel across gaps and steep terrain.
achievements.requirement: Successfully use all the functioning Forgotten teleporters in the Elon Riverlands.

achievements.name: Imposter Syndrome
achievements.requirement: Defeat a clone of yourself during the legendary doppelganger group event.

achievements.name: Blood and Sand
achievements.description: Rumors in Elon Riverlands speak of a terrifying sand shark that's attracted to the scent of blood in the dunes.
achievements.requirement: Kill the monstrous sand shark, Mazomba.

achievements.name: Doppel Dropper
achievements.requirement: Defeat the crazed doppelganger at the end of the Augury Rock meta event.

achievements.name: Race to the Finish: Elon Riverlands
achievements.requirement: Finish the race around Vulture Drifts in first, second, or third place.

achievements.name: Elon Riverlands Griffon Expert: Gold
achievements.requirement: Fly your griffon through the rings as quickly as you can!

achievements.requirement: Fly your griffon through the rings as quickly as you can!

Solve Jubua the Wildfire's fourth riddle.

achievements.name: Fire Dancer

achievements.name: Nap Time
achievements.requirement: Prevent damage to Yumug as he naps midway along his journey to Lommuld Kraal.

achievements.name: Carrot Collector
achievements.description: Search Highjump Ranch for carrots to help Unja and her springers.

achievements.name: The Pied Piper
achievements.description: Tame four different species of animals for the ogres.

achievements.name: Bleeding Heart
achievements.description: Help the nomads in Diviner's Reach by completing all their task requests five different times.

achievements.name: Desert Highlands Champion Bounties
achievements.requirement: Defeat each champion bounty in the Highlands at least once.

achievements.name: Desert Highlands Legendary Bounties
achievements.requirement: Defeat each Legendary bounty in the Highlands at least once.

achievements.name: Smashing!
achievements.description: Defeat Ellutherius Wintergust without being hit by his pot attacks, three consecutive times.

achievements.name: Night Lights
achievements.description: How does it even stay up there?
achievements.requirement: Use the jackal to find the best spot for viewing the sky at night.

achievements.name: Renowned Adventurer: Desert Highlands
achievements.requirement: Complete all of the renown hearts located in the Desert Highlands.

bits.text: Help the Pricklepatch Hollow choya, or don't.

achievements.requirement: Quickly deliver parcels for the Cavalier Express!

achievements.name: Cavalier Express: Gold
achievements.requirement: Quickly deliver parcels for the Cavalier Express!

achievements.name: The Curious Bowl
achievements.description: What a curious thing!
achievements.requirement: Unlock the secret of the curious bowl by standing on a nearby rune.

achievements.description: 50-50 chance!
achievements.requirement: Guess the correct chest in the first mysterious bank vault.

data.name: Chest of the First Room
data.description: Double-click to open.

achievements.name: Breaking the Bank: Vault 2
achievements.description: What have you got to lose?
achievements.requirement: Guess the correct chest in the second mysterious bank vault.

achievements.name: Breaking the Bank: Vault 3
achievements.description: And, behind this door...
achievements.requirement: Guess the correct chest in the third mysterious bank vault.

achievements.name: Breaking the Bank: Final Vault
achievements.description: Sure you want to?
achievements.requirement: Open the final chest in the mysterious vaults.

data.name: Chest of the Final Room
data.description: Double-click to open.

achievements.name: A Family Heirloom
achievements.description: Search the Windshear Scarps for Unja's lost necklace and return it to her.

achievements.name: Rune-locked Doors
achievements.requirement: Find runestones throughout the Derelict Delve to unlock all the mysterious doors.

achievements.name: The Lost Dolyak
achievements.description: Search southern Stampede Uplands for Jeppa's lost dolyak, and then speak to Jeppa.

bits.text: Find Bismuth in southern Stampede Uplands.
Help Jeppa reach her destination and talk to her about Bismuth.

achievements.name: Hidden Carrot Hunt
achievements.description: Someone from Highjump Ranch has hidden carrots. Find them to win the game.
achievements.requirement: Use your springer to find and collect carrots in the Brightwater Inlet.

achievements.name: Race to the Finish: Desert Highlands
achievements.requirement: Finish the race around Brightwater Inlet in first, second, or third place.

name: Collections
description: Achievements for collecting items and unlocking skins in the wardrobe.

achievements.name: The Main Thrust
achievements.requirement: Unlock  Sunspear skins in your wardrobe by crafting or using the Trading Post. Recipes can be purchased from renown vendors in the Crystal Desert after unlocking Elonian weapon skins.

data.name: Nadijeh's Royal Arms Cache
data.description: Double-click to select your choice of ascended weapon recipes for the Marshal's (+Power, +Healing, +Condition Damage, and +Precision) stats, plus an inscription and assorted crafting materials.

achievements.name: Recovered Resplendence
achievements.requirement: Unlock  Spearmarshal's skins in your wardrobe by crafting or using the Trading Post. Recipes can be purchased from renown vendors in the Crystal Desert after unlocking Elonian armor skins.

data.name: Nadijeh's Royal Armor Cache
data.description: Double-click to select your choice of ascended armor recipes for the Marshal's (+Power, +Healing, +Condition Damage, and +Precision) stats, plus an insignia and assorted crafting materials.

achievements.name: Tip of the Spear
achievements.description: <c=@Flavor>In addition to being a cultured and educated populace, the peoples of Elona are notably adept in ways of combat. </c>
achievements.requirement: Recover all  Elonian weapons by completing events, looting chests, and identifying items in renown regions of the Crystal Desert.

data.name: Chest of the First Spear
data.description: Open to choose a unique exotic-quality Sunspear weapon.

achievements.name: Dress Rehearsal
achievements.description: <c=@Flavor>The rich fabrics and detailed patterns found throughout the Crystal Desert speak to the mix of cultures and nations that have called this land their home. </c>
achievements.requirement: Recover all  Elonian armor pieces through completing the Personal Story.

data.name: Crate of the First Spear
data.description: Open to choose a unique, exotic-quality piece of Sunspear armor.

achievements.name: Raise the Banners: Amnoon Independence
achievements.description: You advised Amnoon's council to assert their city's freedom from regional control.
achievements.requirement: Collect all  items to unlock this piece of equipment.

achievements.name: Raise the Banners: Salute to Palawa Joko
achievements.description: You advised Amnoon's council to accept King Joko's offer of military aid.
achievements.requirement: Collect all  items to unlock this piece of equipment.

data.name: Dreaded Banners of King Palawa Joko I

achievements.name: Raise the Banners: Sunspear Support
achievements.description: You advised Amnoon's council to defy King Joko and fly the standard of his Sunspear enemies.
achievements.requirement: Collect all  items to unlock this piece of equipment.

achievements.name: Raise the Banners: Amnoon Arbitrator
achievements.description: You explored all possible paths for Amnoon to take in its time of crisis.
achievements.requirement: Collect all  items to unlock this piece of equipment.

achievements.name: Koutalophile
achievements.description: <c=@flavor>They are so much more than cutlery!</c>
achievements.requirement: Collect all of the spoon trinkets of Tyria.
achievements.locked_text: Purchase a Collectible Spoon Box from Master Collector Rednax Youngblood in Lion's Arch.

data.name: Bag of Mentor's Supplies
data.description:
A collection of items to aid in the training of novice adventurers.
Double-click to open.
