achievements.requirement: Collect these  junk items throughout Tyria.

data.name: Big Bag of Junk
data.description: Standard issue skritt kit, mostly full of garbage.

achievements.name: Uncanny Canner
achievements.requirement: Collect all  jarred trinkets from vendors around Tyria.

data.name: Uncanny Jar
data.description: 20 Slots

achievements.name: Fine Dining
achievements.requirement: Consume  various steaks from around Tyria.

details.name: Metabolic Primer
details.description: Any food eaten while the primer is active will have the same remaining time as the primer, rounded up to the next hour. The metabolic primer does not stack.

achievements.name: Utility Utilizer
achievements.requirement: Use one of each of these  utility boost items.

details.name: Utility Primer
details.description: Any utility item consumed while the primer is active will have the same remaining time as the primer, rounded up to the next hour. Does not stack.

achievements.name: Grawl Archaeological Study
achievements.description: <c=@flavor>You never know what you can learn from someone who's been around longer than you have.</c>
achievements.requirement: Unlock all of the Grawl weapons in your wardrobe and collect a Grawl Paw to learn more about their day-to-day lives.
achievements.locked_text: Loot a Grawl Paw from grawl throughout Tyria.

data.name: Grawl Supply Sack
data.description: Contains obsidian shards, essence of luck, and rare gear.

achievements.name: Krait Antiquarianism Study
achievements.requirement: Unlock all of the krait weapons in your wardrobe, and collect a Krait Scale.
achievements.locked_text: Loot a Krait Scale from krait throughout Tyria.

data.name: Krait Tuning Kit
data.description: Contains the recipe and ingredients to craft krait tuning crystals.

achievements.name: Ogre Expert
achievements.requirement: Unlock all of the ogre weapons in your wardrobe, and collect an Ogre Tooth.
achievements.locked_text: Loot an Ogre Tooth from ogres throughout Tyria.

data.name: Ogre Sharpening Kit

achievements.locked_text: Purchase a membership from Master Brewer Desch at the Eldvin Monastery in Queensdale.

data.description: A collection of items in celebration of your dedication to the Eldvin Monastery Brew of the Month Club.

data.description: Double-click to choose a piece of light, medium, or heavy armor.

achievements.description: <c=@Flavor>Ahead of burial, a Dynastic ruler's ornate jewelry was collected, restored to glory, and placed in their ceremonial armor.</c>
achievements.requirement: Collect  missing gems, and combine them with amalgamated gemstones in the Lair of Zommoros.

data.name: Royal Funerary Coat Box
data.description: Double-click to choose a piece of light, medium, or heavy armor.

achievements.requirement: Recover  lost Guardian statues.

data.description: Double-click to choose a piece of light, medium, or heavy armor.

achievements.name: Washing the Brow
achievements.description: <c=@Flavor>It was written, "Burial should be as luxurious as life—or more, as it sets the tone by which a monarch is remembered forever."</c>
achievements.requirement: Gather  luxuries from renown merchants across the Elonian Desert.

data.description: Double-click to choose a piece of light, medium, or heavy armor.

achievements.requirement: Bring  tales of your adventures to the Elisa, the traveler.

data.name: Royal Funerary Shoulder Box
data.description: Double-click to choose a piece of light, medium, or heavy armor.

achievements.name: Triumph of Conquests

achievements.name: Legend Builder
achievements.description: Combine 2 Lesser Vision Crystals with 3 Vials of Blood, 6 Sapphires, and 15 Globs of Ectoplasm in the Mystic Forge to create an Ectoplasm-Infused Vision Crystal.
achievements.requirement: Help Bakkin earn renown and fire the Favor of the Colossus.
achievements.locked_text: Create and consume an Ectoplasm-Infused Vision Crystal to begin this journey.

achievements.name: Guide to Greater Understanding
achievements.description: Combine 2 Lesser Vision Crystals with 3 Vials of Blood, 6 Sapphires, and 15 Globs of Ectoplasm in the Mystic Forge to create an Ectoplasm-Infused Vision Crystal.
achievements.requirement: Show Xeniph the hope of a brave new world.
achievements.locked_text: Create and consume an Ectoplasm-Infused Vision Crystal to begin this journey.

achievements.name: Healing Heir
achievements.description: Combine 2 Lesser Vision Crystals with 3 Vials of Blood, 6 Sapphires, and 15 Globs of Ectoplasm in the Mystic Forge to create an Ectoplasm-Infused Vision Crystal.
achievements.requirement: Mend Nayeli's splintered soul.
achievements.locked_text: Create and consume an Ectoplasm-Infused Vision Crystal to begin this journey.

achievements.name: The Moot I: The Experimental Mace
achievements.description: First comes the hunt—the matching of martial prowess against the bestial cunning. Mighty creatures roam the land, and as you stalk them, consider their place, in these initial steps to creating the legendary precursor known as The Energizer. Hurry! Before someone gets eaten!
achievements.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

data.name: Chest of the Hunt
data.description: Contains an Essence of the Hunt and recipes for first-tier The Energizer.

achievements.name: The Moot II: The Perfected Mace
achievements.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor The Energizer has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

data.name: Tricks and Tips for Legendary Mace Crafting
data.description: Contains the book "Expertise in Mace Crafting" and recipes for second-tier The Energizer.

achievements.name: The Moot III: The Energizer
achievements.description: After the successful hunt comes the celebration, when all the pent-up energy of the battle is released in food and song. Drink, dine, dance, and revel across the land of Tyria in your journey to attain the legendary precursor known as the Energizer.

data.name: Chest of the Celebration
data.description: Contains an Essence of the Celebration and recipes for completing The Energizer.

achievements.name: Bolt I: The Experimental Sword
achievements.description: Tyria's finest sword wielders are pure artists, deftly weaving traditional attacks with inspirational lightning maneuvers to create a deadly dance of steel. Consider the art and artisanship of Tyria as you take the first steps in your crafting of the legendary precursor Zap.
achievements.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

data.description: Contains the book "Expertise in Sword Crafting" and recipes for second-tier Zap.

achievements.name: Bolt III: Zap
achievements.description: Brilliance strikes like a bolt from the blue, and that electric shock of imagination applies to both wielding and crafting the mightiest of weapons. Gather the energies of Tyria to infuse them into a superior weapon in your journey to craft the legendary precursor Zap.

data.name: Chest of Energy
data.description: Contains the Essence of Energy and recipes for completing Zap.

achievements.name: The Flameseeker Prophecies I: The Experimental Shield
achievements.description: Tyria is a land of heroes and villains locked in eternal struggle. Attain the "Anthology of Villains," and record the tales of the defeat of the most dastardly of their lot. Meditate upon the nature of villainy as you take the first steps in creating the legendary precursor known as The Chosen.
achievements.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

achievements.name: The Flameseeker Prophecies III: The Chosen
achievements.description: Tyria is a land of heroes and villains locked in eternal struggle. Attain the "Anthology of Heroes," and record the tales of the greatest of their number, both from the past and the heroes of today. Consider the true nature of heroism in your efforts to craft the legendary precursor known as The Chosen.

data.name: Chest of Heroes
data.description: Contains the Essence of Heroes and recipes for completing The Chosen.

achievements.name: Frenzy I: The Experimental Harpoon Gun
achievements.description: Fishing in Tyria is no pleasant day spent safely on the shore, waiting for a fish to take the bait. It is fought on the fish's home turf, a battle of fisherman against fish. And the fish fight back. Consider this as you take your first steps in crafting the legendary precursor Rage.
achievements.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

data.description: Contains the book "Expertise in Harpoon Gun Crafting" and recipes for second-tier Rage.

achievements.name: Frenzy III: Rage
achievements.description: Quaggans are a peaceful people, but when provoked, quaggans become engines of anger and fury. Usually, though, quaggans like friends. Quaggans want give them friendship bracelets. Will you be quaggans' friend? Consider your reply carefully as you seek to attain the legendary precursor Rage.

data.name: Chest of Quaggan Friendship
data.description: Contains the Essence of Quaggan Friendship and recipes for completing Rage.

achievements.name: Frostfang I: The Experimental Axe
achievements.description: The power of Jormag and the other Elder Dragons seeped into the lands of Tyria during the long epochs while they slept. Upwellings of this power may be found throughout the land, for those who know where to look and how to capture it. Let finding this power be the first part of your journey to craft the legendary precursor Tooth of Frostfang.
achievements.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

achievements.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor Tooth of Frostfang has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. data.name: Tricks and Tips for Advanced Axe Crafting
data.description: Contains the book "Expertise in Axe Crafting" and recipes for second-tier Tooth of Frostfang.

achievements.name: Frostfang III: Tooth of Frostfang
achievements.description: Within the halls of the norn hang the Fang of the Serpent, a fragment of the great ice Elder Dragon. Frostfang was the greatest of Jormag's champions, and Asgeir Dragonrender slayed Frostfang with but a single blow. Channel this power over ice into your efforts to create the legendary precursor Tooth of Frostfang.

data.description: Contains the Essence of Freezing and recipes for completing Tooth of Frostfang.

Consider their combined power as you channel the wolf's hunting spirit in your initial steps to attack the legendary precursor, Howl.
achievements.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

achievements.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor Howl has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. data.description: Contains the Essence of Spirit and recipes for completing Howl.

data.description: Contains the book "Expertise in Dagger Crafting" and recipes for second-tier Spark.

achievements.description: The wonders of the stone and soil, carved by nature and by sentient races, exude both power and stability. Meditate on these great places in order to take your first steps in creating the legendary precursor known as The Colossus.

achievements.description: The power of the earth is not only in its strength but in its fluid nature, moving slowly as stone should not move. Collect and bond with the oozes that live in the heart of the world to solve their mysteries and create the legendary precursor The Colossus.

Consider the place of these great beasts in the world, for good and ill, as you take your first steps in creating the legendary precursor known as Carcharias.

Meditate on the power of such things as you begin your journey to create the legendary precursor, Leaf of Kudzu.
achievements.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

achievements.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor Leaf of Kudzu has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. data.description: Contains the book "Expertise in Longbow Crafting" and recipes for second-tier Leaf of Kudzu.

achievements.description: The Jotun Star, fabled relic of the ancient mystical race, was said to call down a rainbow to the land. The stone, and its power, was broken long ago. Help bring it to rest as the first part of your journey to craft the legendary precursor The Legend.
achievements.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

achievements.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

Some dreams are bright, some are dark, some are for things lost, and some are for things yet to be. Gather these fragments of dreams and desires to channel into your efforts to create the legendary precursor known as The Lover.

achievements.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

achievements.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

achievements.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

Help Ogden Stonehealer in revealing and gathering ancient knowledge in your quest to create the Device, the first of the precursors to the legendary axe Astralaria.
achievements.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

data.name: Chest of Ancient Knowledge
data.description: Contains the Essence of Ancient Knowledge and a Recipe: The Device.

achievements.name: Astralaria II: The Apparatus
achievements.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor The Mechanism has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

data.name: Tricks and Tips for Celestial Axe Crafting
data.description: Contains the book "Expertise in Advanced Axe Crafting" and a Recipe: The Apparatus.

achievements.name: Astralaria III: The Mechanism
achievements.description: The heavens grant their gifts to Tyria in the form of meteors that streak across our skies. Gather the ore of these fallen stars and use it to craft the spinning armillary that will eventually rest in the heart of your legendary weapon. Do this to create The Mechanism, the next step of your quest to attain Astralaria.

data.name: Chest of Time and Space
data.description: Contains the Essence of Time and Space and a Recipe: The Mechanism.

achievements.name: Astralaria IV: The Cosmos
achievements.description: The heavens have aligned to support you in your quest! Chart their places within the heavens to discern their wisdom, and defeat the Elder Dragons and their spawn that threaten the world. Complete these tasks, and earn the Gift of the Cosmos, the penultimate step in attaining the legendary axe known as Astralaria.

data.name: Gift of the Cosmos
data.description: Used to craft the Gift of Astralaria.

achievements.name: HOPE I: Research
achievements.description: The froglike hylek are Tyria's best alchemists, the masters of potion and poison. Take the role of the apprentice in discovering the secrets of their work to create research, the first step in attaining the Hylek Optimized Projectile Experiment (HOPE).
achievements.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

data.name: Chest of Concoctions
data.description: Contains the Essence of Concoctions and a Recipe: Research.

achievements.name: HOPE II: Development
achievements.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor Prototype has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

data.name: Tricks and Tips for Mechanical Pistol Crafting
data.description: Contains the book "Expertise in Mechanical Pistol Crafting" and a Recipe: Development.

achievements.name: HOPE III: Prototype
achievements.description: As the hylek are masters of alchemy, so too are the asura the wizards of technomagical research. They understand the forces in play in their Eternal Alchemy and how to apply them to the greater world. Uncover their secrets in your work to attain Prototype, the next step in your legendary journey for attaining HOPE.

data.name: Chest of Anomaly
data.description: Contains the Essence of Anomaly and a Recipe: Prototype.

achievements.name: HOPE IV: The Catalyst
achievements.description: Let magical energy and alchemical potions combine as you bring the energies of asura and hylek together to create and charge a more perfect weapon, gaining the Gift of the Catalyst, the penultimate step in your journey to gain HOPE, the legendary pistol.

data.name: Gift of the Catalyst
data.description: Used to craft the Gift of HOPE.

achievements.name: Nevermore I: Ravenswood Branch
achievements.description: The bounty of Tyria's nature is immense but not without limit, and as such must be cultivated, encouraged, and most of all protected. Get in touch with nature of Tyria in your quest to create the Ravenswood Branch, the first of the precursors to the legendary staff, Nevermore.
achievements.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

data.name: Chest of Natural Protection
data.description: Contains the Essence of Natural Protection and a Recipe: Ravenswood Branch.

achievements.name: Nevermore II: Ravenswood Staff
achievements.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor The Raven Staff has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

data.name: Tricks and Tips for Runed Staff Crafting
data.description: Contains the book "Expertise in Runed Staff Crafting" and a Recipe: Ravenswood Staff.

achievements.name: Nevermore III: The Raven Staff
achievements.description: Tyria is both a physical and a spiritual place, and its hills and forests are alive with ghosts, spirits, and other ethereal creatures. Seek the spirit of the wild raven that haunts its hills and forests. Let it lead you on its path in your quest to attain the Raven Staff, the next step in your quest to attain Nevermore.

data.name: Chest of the Wild Spirit
data.description: Contains the Essence of the Wild Spirit and a Recipe: The Raven Staff.

achievements.name: Nevermore IV: The Raven Spirit
achievements.description: Take upon yourself the responsibility of raising a raven from egg to chick to adult, while you work toward taming the wild raven spirit you have already caught. With the blessings of the Great Spirit, Raven, these two are destined to join together, earning you the Gift of the Raven Spirit, the penultimate step to attaining the legendary staff, Nevermore.

data.name: Gift of the Raven Spirit
data.description: Used to craft the Gift of Nevermore.

achievements.name: Chuka and Champawat I: The Hunt
achievements.description: Great game is what makes a great hunt, and few beasts are greater than the ferocious tiger. Sightings of such a creature have been made around Tyria. With a veteran hunter's tutelage, this glorious hunt could be yours.
achievements.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

data.name: Chest of the Hunt
data.description: Contains the Essence of the Hunt and a Recipe: The Great Hunt.

achievements.name: Chuka and Champawat I: Hunter's Journal
achievements.description: "Under Bagred's tutelage, I now undertake my hunt. These pages will chronicle the greatness of my deed."
achievements.locked_text: Speak with Bagred the Hunter near Hrothgar's Pass in Snowden Drifts.

data.name: Completed Hunter's Journal
data.description:
A record of your exploits as a hunter.
Double-click to read.

achievements.name: Chuka and Champawat III: Tigris
achievements.description: What set the tigers on their mysterious rampage? Were they simply crazed beasts, or is there a deeper story? Seek out the naturalist Cymbel for answers.

data.name: Chest of the Tiger
data.description: Contains the Essence of the Tiger and a Recipe: Tigris.

achievements.name: Chuka and Champawat III: Naturalist's Journal
achievements.description: "I set out again with Cymbel as my guide, this time to understand. I now want these pages to capture not my greatness, but the greatness of the creature I pursued."
achievements.locked_text: Bring a crude leather book to Cymbel after gaining her trust.

data.name: Completed Naturalist's Journal
data.description:
A record of your exploits as a naturalist.
Double-click to read.

achievements.name: Chuka and Champawat IV: A Nontraditional Family
achievements.description: "Family isn't defined by blood or a shared name. They're who we go to when everything's against us, and we know they'll be there for us for no reason other than we're us."

data.name: Gift of Family
data.description: Used to craft the Gift of Chuka and Champawat.

achievements.name: Chuka and Champawat IV: Secluded Tour
achievements.description: There must be somewhere in Tyria where tigers can live in peace.

data.name: Tiger Den Map
data.description:
A map to your hidden tiger den.
Double-click to read.

achievements.name: Chuka and Champawat IV: Baby Book
achievements.description: "This book is a record of the times my tiger cubs and I shared."

data.name: Completed Baby Book
data.description:
Memories of your cubs' first moments.
Double-click to access your tiger den.

achievements.name: Chuka and Champawat II: Ambush
achievements.description: Your first attempt to craft the legendary precursor Tigris has been modestly successful, but it has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

data.name: Tricks and Tips for Short Bow Crafting
data.description: Contains the book "Expertise in Advanced Short Bow Crafting" and a Recipe: The Ambush.

achievements.name: Chuka and Champawat IV: Tiger Training Guide
achievements.description: "As my tigers grow, it's a daily challenge to learn for myself the lessons I need to be able to impart to the cubs when they're ready."

data.name: Annotated Tiger Training Guide
data.description:
This worn book is covered in notes and drawings.
Double-click to access your tiger den.

bits.text: Northwatch Descent: Deep underground below the outpost.
Bristleback Chasm: Somewhere up high in Vinetooth's Den.
Eastwatch Bluff: Overlooking an Eastwatch pylon where an Exalted sage is pulled from his duties.
Griffonfall: Hidden at the bottom of a secret waterfall.
Chak Hollow: Overlooking a razed Nuhoch village.
Morwood Wilds: Behind the vine wall, but be aware that timing is everything!
Bristleback Chasm: Across the falls, stuck on a tree.
Eastwatch Bluff: Look behind the various waterfalls.
The Falls: Check every southern-side tree branch leading down to the falls.
The Falls: Somewhere behind the expansive wall of water.
Westwatch Patch: Within the upper walls of the golden ooze cavern.
Tarnished Treetop: Look on the southern-canopy tree branches for this mask.
Northwatch Descent: On a southwestern ledge with an amazing view of the outpost.
Maguuma Shallows: On an upper perch near where creatures grow big.
Burnisher Quarry: Within the waters at the top of the waterfall.
Mossheart Walk: Within a small cave opposite wyvern's pylon.
Chak Hollow: Located within a southern alcove with a good view to the entrance of Tangled Depths.
Morwood Wilds: In the sky overlooking one of the blighted saplings.
Balthazar's Rest: On a rock with a clear view of the temple door.
Southwatch Creep: Look behind the northwestern wall that faces the outpost itself.
Southwatch Creep: Look to the east by the top of the Tarir entrance.
Southwatch Creep: Check the top roots when heading east on your way to the crash site.
Tarnished Treetop: Keep an eye out on the lower canopy near fungi royalty.
Lastgear Standing: On the outskirts of the cave entrance.
Arrowhead Vale: Overlooking the northern entrance to Tarir.

achievements.description: Help save the great city of Tarir by fending off invading Mordrem.

achievements.description: All he wanted was a break...

achievements.locked_text: Find the elusive whittling Itzel.

achievements.requirement: Speak to Sage Laural at Westgate to receive an auric viewer, then scan the tablets in the city for clues to Herta's location.

data.name: Deciphered Clues
data.description:
Double-click to open.
Check the achievement Where Exalted Dare to see what the clues revealed.

achievements.name: Mordrem Begone
achievements.description: Spray those Mordrem until they stop moving. Then spray some more.
achievements.requirement: Participate in the assault on the northern octovine during the Battle in Tarir.

achievements.description: Watch out for those ancient chess golems. They're known to cheat.
achievements.requirement: Complete the jumping puzzle.

achievements.description: Get to the top of the inner chamber in Tarir.
achievements.requirement: Complete the jumping puzzle.

achievements.name: Treetop Retriever
achievements.description: They made the ultimate sacrifice.
achievements.requirement: Locate the 10 lost Priory corpses in the Tarnished Treetop of Auric Basin.

bits.text: A female asura researcher was last seen north of Wanderer's Waypoint.
Since he went to an upper ledge to examine the Exalted portal, the asura researcher hasn't been heard from.
Someone overheard the Zintl boasting about finding the remains of a female charr explorer.
Echoes of a male charr explorer fighting a large colony of vampire beasts filled the canopy the other night.
A human explorer bailed from the airship too early. She was lost near Capitzel Grounds.
Heading east, the explorer was cornered by a jaguar. The human never made it down from the canopy.
An injured norn historian held off the bonebreaker so others could escape. Her sacrifice won't be forgotten.
A lower ledge broke his fall, but then the norn explorer was surrounded by Tengu scouts.
A sylvari historian got trapped along the northern cliffside of Tarnished Treetop. She had little chance to survive.
An explorer tried to find his way south and down from the canopy. The sylvari only found a Coztic ambush.

achievements.name: Where Exalted Dare
achievements.requirement: Go to the vinetooth den to find Herta.
achievements.locked_text: Speak to Sage Laural at Westgate to receive an auric viewer, then scan the tablets in the city for clues to Herta's location.

data.name: Herta
data.description:
Double-click to feed 250 Piles of bloodstone dust in exchange for a gift. Applies 1 stack of Aurillium Plating if used in the Auric Basin. Herta can only absorb a limited amount of bloodstone dust in a day.

The recovered head of this Exalted continues to glow, presumably with consciousness.

achievements.name: Friend of the Frogs
achievements.description: The Nuhoch will warble your legend forever!
achievements.requirement: Participate in every stage of building Teku Nuhoch back up.

achievements.name: Honorary Rata Novan
achievements.description: You became the Citizen of Tomorrow, today!
achievements.requirement: Participate in every stage of building Rata Novus back up.

achievements.name: Potoni Masher
achievements.description: Stronger than the Nuhoch champion!
achievements.requirement: Defeat Potoni the Massive in Tangled Depths.

achievements.name: Honorary Ogre
achievements.description: The ogres consider you one of their own. In this case, that's a compliment.
achievements.requirement: Participate in every stage of the ogres' survival in Tangled Depths.

achievements.name: Cloak and Snagger
achievements.description: You've stealthily glided past the Mordrem snipers and stolen their supplies!
achievements.requirement: Bypass the Mordrem snipers using stealth gliding and steal their supplies!

achievements.name: SCAR Supporter
achievements.description: Great to have you lead the way, Commander!
achievements.requirement: Participate in every stage of helping the SCAR team recover from the crash.

achievements.name: Dive Master: Chak Hive
achievements.requirement: Use the diving goggles near the SCAR outpost.

achievements.name: Archeotech Adept
achievements.description: You've learned how to repair the archaic technology in Rata Novus.
achievements.requirement: Collect all of the parts needed to repair the ancient broken golem in Rata Novus.

data.name: Rata Novus Writ of Excellence
data.description: An award given to particularly bright students of Rata Novus. Collect 10 to rummage through Zinn's research supplies.

achievements.name: Chak Bait
achievements.description: Look out—the bugs are ambushing!
achievements.requirement: Trigger  chak ambushes.

achievements.name: Crystallized Cache Seeker
achievements.description: Pretty and rewarding!
achievements.requirement: Open  crystallized supply caches.

achievements.name: Champion Chak Hunter
achievements.description: No chak is safe.
achievements.requirement: Kill  champion chak.

bits.text: Kill the enraged chak overlord lurking in the chak stronghold.
Slay the champion chak blitzer to complete the Nuhoch's beetle training.
Eliminate the gigantic chak lobber in the valley outside Teku Nuhoch.
Rescue Zildi's Assist-o-Matic from the chak lobber near Rata Novus.
Defend the SCAR camp from the shielded chak blitzer.
Outsmart the chak crown and disrupt the chak in the Ley-Line Confluence.
Defeat the extra goopy chak lobber in the hive near the SCAR lane.

achievements.name: Disco Dancing Delver
achievements.description: You got your groove on in the disco cave!
achievements.requirement: Dance in the secret disco cave.

achievements.name: Elusive Elemental Eliminator
achievements.description: Secret elemental destroyed!
achievements.requirement: Kill the secret earth elemental.

achievements.name: Gerent Slayer
achievements.description: The bigger they are...
achievements.requirement: Kill the chak gerent.

achievements.name: Ogre Airship Climber
achievements.description: Wow, what a view.
achievements.requirement: Climb to the top of the crashed airship in the Ogre camp.

achievements.name: The Longest Glide
achievements.description: Talk about hang time!
achievements.requirement: Glide from the Mordrem migration path in SCAR Field Operations all the way to Dragon's Passage.

achievements.name: Roost Rouster
achievements.description: Watch 'em scramble!
achievements.requirement: Scare  bird flocks.

achievements.name: Lost Lab Locator
achievements.description: Just the spot to set up shop.
achievements.requirement: Find the secret Rata Novus laboratory.

achievements.name: Nuhoch Lane Defender
achievements.description: Super spore stomper!
achievements.requirement: Successfully participate in the Nuhoch lane for the entirety of the King of the Jungle battle.

achievements.name: SCAR Lane Defender
achievements.description: Chak killing machine!
achievements.requirement: Successfully participate in the SCAR lane for the entirety of the King of the Jungle battle.

achievements.name: Rata Novus Lane Defender
achievements.description: Ley-energy throwing expert!
achievements.requirement: Successfully participate in the Rata Novus lane for the entirety of the King of the Jungle battle.

achievements.name: Ogre Lane Defender
achievements.description: Chak-egg crusher!
achievements.requirement: Successfully participate in the Ogre lane for the entirety of the King of the Jungle battle.

achievements.name: Triple Mordrem Takedown
achievements.description: Mowing down Mordrem like a boss.
achievements.requirement: Kill all three possible Mordrem champions in Dragon's Passage.

achievements.name: Chak Egg Scrambler
achievements.description: This is sure to egg the chak on!
achievements.requirement: Destroy all of the chak eggs in the scrap cannon adventure in one attempt.

achievements.name: Pulse Room Glider
achievements.description: That was some aerobatic feat!
achievements.requirement: Fly to the place of power in the Ley-Line Confluence.

achievements.name: Master Mushroom Spelunker
achievements.requirement: Find your way to the treasure chest in the mushroom cave in Tangled Depths.

achievements.name: "Sword of Smodur" Strongbox
achievements.requirement: Search in the Chak Stronghold area for the strongbox from the "Sword of Smodur."

achievements.name: "Cryptonym" Strongbox
achievements.requirement: Search in the Undergrowth Connector area for the strongbox from the "Cryptonym."

achievements.name: "Whitebear's Pride II" Strongbox
achievements.requirement: Search in the Northern Confluence Passage area for the strongbox from the "Whitebear's Pride II."

achievements.name: "Shard of Brilliance" Strongbox
achievements.requirement: Search in the Tangled Descent area for the strongbox from the "Shard of Brilliance."

achievements.name: "Plains of Golghein" Strongbox
achievements.requirement: Search in the Ley Line Confluence area for the strongbox from the "Plains of Golghein."

achievements.name: The Ley-Line Run: Silver
achievements.requirement: Zap your way through the checkpoints and across the finish line!

achievements.name: The Ley-Line Run: Gold
achievements.requirement: Zap your way through the checkpoints and across the finish line!

achievements.name: Drone Race: Silver
achievements.requirement: Boost and blast your way through the checkpoints and across the finish line!

achievements.name: Drone Race: Gold
achievements.requirement: Boost and blast your way through the checkpoints and across the finish line!

achievements.name: Scrap Rifle Field Test: Silver
achievements.requirement: Kill as many chak as you can before the timer runs out, but be careful—your scrap rifle is prone to overheating! Destroying chak eggs will release a goo that will heal you and cool your rifle if you are close by, but it's likely to stir up the chak.

achievements.name: Scrap Rifle Field Test: Gold
achievements.requirement: Kill as many chak as you can before the timer runs out, but be careful—your scrap rifle is prone to overheating! Destroying chak eggs will release a goo that will heal you and cool your rifle if you are close by, but it's likely to stir up the chak.

achievements.name: Beetle Feast: Gold
achievements.requirement: Eat yellow mushrooms to score points and blue mushrooms to gain abilities that help you in your hunt. Beware of the poisonous mushrooms with green spores, and use your burrow ability to bypass closed gates!

achievements.name: Beetle Feast: Silver
achievements.requirement: Eat yellow mushrooms to score points and blue mushrooms to gain abilities that help you in your hunt. Beware of the poisonous mushrooms with green spores, and use your burrow ability to bypass closed gates!

achievements.name: Haywire Punch-o-Matic Battle: Gold
achievements.requirement: Smash some chak!

achievements.name: Haywire Punch-o-Matic Battle: Silver
achievements.requirement: Smash some chak!

achievements.name: Chak Crusher
achievements.requirement: Defeat the Chak Driver in Tangled Depths.

achievements.name: Skritt Salvager
achievements.description: Show me the shinies!
achievements.requirement: Loot a skritt burglar's treasure chest.

achievements.name: Caught 'Em All
achievements.description: You don't actually have to catch 'em all...
achievements.requirement: Catch the goodies released from a floating crate in the sky.

achievements.name: Raised the Bar
achievements.description: Don't be so insecure.
achievements.requirement: Participate in raising the security level at night while fully eligible.

achievements.name: Ongoing Defense
achievements.description: Job's not done yet...
achievements.requirement: Defend one of the completed Pact towers when it falls under attack.

achievements.name: Diarmid Dropper
achievements.description: Your machete may not be enough...
achievements.requirement: Defeat Blighted Diarmid.

achievements.name: Lord of the Jungle
achievements.description: Loincloths will be all the rage next season...
achievements.requirement: Heal or enhance Lord Faren to support his training.

achievements.name: Wartime Sommelier
achievements.description: First class all the way!
achievements.requirement: Find some wine in the wreckage and serve one of the nobles.

achievements.name: Excellent Judge of Character
achievements.description: Judge them justly!
achievements.requirement: Pardon an innocent sylvari held in the Pact encampment.

achievements.name: Equitable Elector
achievements.description: If you want something done right...
achievements.requirement: Participate in the election of all 3 potential Pact leaders.

achievements.name: Egg Run
achievements.description: Be quick, but be careful. Also, be quick!
achievements.requirement: Deliver a wyvern egg to Utogi in less than 5 seconds.

achievements.name: The Most Dangerous Game
achievements.description: No, the prey isn't human...
achievements.requirement: Reach and complete the final stage of an Itzel hunting excursion.

achievements.name: Grassy Troll
achievements.description: Bolt actions speak louder than words!
achievements.requirement: Land 100 damaging shots with a Pale Reaver sniper rifle.

achievements.name: Dive Master: Verdant Brink
achievements.description: Abandon ship without a chute!
achievements.requirement: Use the diving goggles found in the Pact fleet wreckage in Verdant Brink.

achievements.name: Jungle Totem Hunter
achievements.description: No, you don't have to carry them all the way back...
achievements.requirement: Discover all the lost Itzel totems in Verdant Brink.

achievements.name: Bronzer
achievements.description: It won't turn your skin orange, unless you already are...
achievements.requirement: Earn a bronze medal or better on all 5 adventures in Verdant Brink.

achievements.name: Froglicker
achievements.description: Give those frogs a licking!
achievements.requirement: Defeat Cotoni and Huetzi after nightfall.

achievements.name: Sky Stalker
achievements.description: Now you see him...
achievements.requirement: Defeat Axemaster Gwyllion after nightfall in Verdant Brink.

achievements.name: Tetrad Trouncer
achievements.description: Four times the trouble; four times the fun.
achievements.requirement: Defeat the Mordrem tetrad after nightfall in Verdant Brink.

achievements.name: Father of Wyverns
achievements.description: Just wait until their father gets home...
achievements.requirement: Defeat the wyvern patriarch after nightfall in Verdant Brink.

achievements.name: Mother of Wyverns
achievements.description: Those are her babies and grandbabies you've been killing...
achievements.requirement: Defeat the wyvern matriarch after nightfall in Verdant Brink.

achievements.name: Sky Commander
achievements.description: Master of all you survey!
achievements.requirement: Defeat all nightfall bosses in Verdant Brink.

achievements.name: Ordnance Corps Auxiliary
achievements.description: Raze some hell!
achievements.requirement: Complete the Ordnance Corps outpost.

achievements.name: Patron of the Nobility
achievements.description: Privileged to be here!
achievements.requirement: Complete the Noble Crash Site outpost.

achievements.name: Pact Camper
achievements.description: Establishing law and order wherever you go.
achievements.requirement: Complete the Pact Encampment outpost.

achievements.name: Honorary Jaka Itzel
achievements.description: It's not easy being Itzel.
achievements.requirement: Complete the Jaka Itzel outpost.

achievements.name: Pale Reaver Believer
achievements.description: Their aim is true!
achievements.requirement: Complete the Pale Reavers' outpost.

achievements.name: Ground Pounder
achievements.description: Take command of the jungle!
achievements.requirement: Complete all 5 outposts in the Verdant Brink.

achievements.requirement: Search in the Noble Ledges area for the strongbox from the "Glory of Tyria."

achievements.requirement: Search in the Noble Ledges area for the strongbox from the "Thunderbreaker."

achievements.name: "Mellaggan's Valor" Strongbox
achievements.requirement: Search in the Blighted Depths area for the strongbox from the "Mellaggan's Valor."

achievements.name: "Lethal Vantage" Strongbox
achievements.requirement: Search in the Creeping Crevasse area for the strongbox from the "Lethal Vantage."

achievements.name: Bugs in the Branches: Gold

name: Competitive
description: Achievements related to PvP, WvW, and activities.

achievements.name: Master of Om
achievements.requirement: Complete all Belcher's Bluff achievements.

achievements.name: Frequent Belcher
achievements.requirement: Play Belcher's Bluff against other players.

achievements.name: Punisher
achievements.requirement: Punish opponents for using Bluff.

achievements.name: Drinks All Around!
achievements.requirement: Play Belcher's Bluff with a player of every race.

achievements.name: You've Got the Moves
achievements.requirement: Obtain Signature Moves by defeating all six Masters of Om.

achievements.name: Flaunt It
achievements.requirement: Use all six Signature Moves against your opponents.

achievements.name: One Drink Left
achievements.requirement: Defeat your opponent while being one drink away from losing.

achievements.name: Crystal Obsessed
achievements.description: In Sanctum Sprint, collect as many crystals as possible.
achievements.requirement: Collect  crystals.

achievements.name: Skilled Sprinter
achievements.description: Use pickup skills on fellow racers in the Sanctum Sprint.
achievements.requirement: Use  pickup skills.

achievements.name: Speedy Sprinter
achievements.description: Place among the top three racers in Sanctum Sprint.
achievements.requirement: Place in the top three  times.

achievements.name: Frequent Sprinter
achievements.description: Just one more lap...
achievements.requirement: Run  races of Sanctum Sprint.

data.name: Loot Bag
data.description: Double-click to open.

achievements.name: Realm Avenger
achievements.description: You see dead people. A lot!
achievements.requirement: Kill  player.

achievements.name: Yakslapper
achievements.description: You're a caravan's worst nightmare.
achievements.requirement: Kill  enemy supply caravan.

achievements.name: A Pack Dolyak's Best Friend
achievements.description: Caravans have nothing to fear when you're around.
achievements.requirement: Successfully escort  supply caravan.

achievements.description: If you build it, they will die.
achievements.requirement: Spend  supply.

achievements.name: Master of Disaster
achievements.description: You can build a trebuchet in your sleep.
achievements.requirement: Spend  supply on siege.

achievements.name: Repair Master
achievements.description: If they damage it, you repair it.
achievements.requirement: Spend  supply on repairs.

achievements.name: Take Everything in Sight
achievements.description: Our enemies can only hold out against you for so long.
achievements.requirement: Capture  objectives.

achievements.name: Going Camping
achievements.description: Supply camps crumble under your assaults.
achievements.requirement: Capture  supply camp.

achievements.name: It's Quite Roomy in Here
achievements.description: Towers are like a second home to you.
achievements.requirement: Capture  towers.

achievements.name: All We See, We Own
achievements.description: Can these keeps guard any secrets from you?
achievements.requirement: Capture  keeps.

achievements.name: King of the Castle
achievements.description: This is MY castle!
achievements.requirement: Capture Stonemist Castle  times.

achievements.name: Stay Out!
achievements.description: When you say you'll defend something, you really mean it!
achievements.requirement: Defend  objectives.

achievements.name: Walls Get in the Way
achievements.description: Supply camps are impenetrable fortresses with you around.
achievements.requirement: Defend  supply camps.

achievements.name: Stopped Them Cold
achievements.description: Towers are easy to defend once you know how it's done!
achievements.requirement: Defend  towers.

achievements.name: Nice View From Up Here
achievements.description: The walls are nearly as tough as you are.
achievements.requirement: Defend  keeps.

achievements.name: Stonemist Stands Firm—Again
achievements.description: Stonemist is known for breaking armies. You're part of the reason why.
achievements.requirement: Defend Stonemist Castle  times.

achievements.requirement: Fall off any of the floating islands and plummet into the Mists.

achievements.requirement: Successfully complete each of the three tower bucket dives.

achievements.requirement: Equip a pair of diving goggles, jump off the top of Tytone Perch, and land in a bucket of water.

achievements.name: Tidal Splash
achievements.requirement: Equip a pair of diving goggles, jump off the top of Inferno's Needle, and land in a bucket of water.

achievements.name: Daring Dunk
achievements.requirement: Equip a pair of diving goggles, jump off the top of Stonegaze Spire, and land in a bucket of water.

achievements.name: Resourceful
achievements.requirement: Capture  supply generator.

achievements.name: Some Say It's Your Specialty
achievements.requirement: Capture  special objective.

achievements.name: Let It Glow
achievements.requirement: Control the altar and transform into a Spirit of Light.

achievements.name: Intruder Alert
achievements.requirement: Purchase a sentry turret at the observatory and deploy it.

achievements.name: Check Out These Guns
achievements.requirement: Control the statuary and fire the super cannons.

achievements.name: Wurmhole Traveler
achievements.requirement: Control the wurm tunnel, and then travel through one of the tunnel entrances.

achievements.name: Nice Ride
achievements.requirement: Transform into a mecha siege devourer at the workshop.

achievements.name: Make It Rain
achievements.requirement: Purchase an air-strike grenade at the airport and rain destruction from the sky.

achievements.requirement: Summon the Claw of Koda at the shrine.

achievements.requirement: Control the bell tower, and then ring a bell to summon a Spirit of Koda.

achievements.name: Smash Happy
achievements.requirement: Purchase Koda's Hammer at the forge.

achievements.name: No Road? No Problem!
achievements.requirement: Spend  supply by building bridges.

achievements.name: Bridge Buster
achievements.requirement: Destroy  bridge.

achievements.name: Generator Generator
achievements.requirement: Spend  supply by generating generators.

achievements.name: Blades in the Mists
achievements.requirement: Kill Aetherblades in the Edge of the Mists.

achievements.description: Carry the crab in the Southsun Crab Toss.
achievements.requirement: Carry  crabs.

achievements.name: Crabgrabber
achievements.description: Steal and deny the crab from other players in the Southsun Crab Toss.
achievements.requirement: Steal  crabs.

achievements.name: Crab Toss Champion
achievements.description: Win the Southsun Crab Toss.
achievements.requirement: Win  times.

achievements.name: Crab Toss Regular
achievements.requirement: Participate in  rounds.

achievements.name: Blinded with Science
achievements.requirement: Vaporize yourself in the mastermind's projection beam before the fight begins.

achievements.name: Playing for Keeps
achievements.requirement: Bounce a single globolla marble on your head eight times in a row.

achievements.name: In Bloom
achievements.description: Look in the face of death...
achievements.requirement: Defeat Skorvald the Shattered without being hit by a Solar Bloom explosion.

achievements.name: Mind Out of Time
achievements.description: Bling-9009 has received reports of your exploits and now carries new items!
achievements.requirement: Accept the harbinger's challenge and defeat the mastermind in the Shattered Observatory fractal.

achievements.name: Be Dynamic
achievements.description: A full party of five must participate in the fractal from start to finish without dying.
achievements.requirement: Accept the harbinger's challenge and complete the Shattered Observatory fractal with no one in your group being defeated.

achievements.name: Live Wire
achievements.requirement: Suffer the shocking fate of curiosity.

achievements.name: Fractal Frequenter
achievements.description: You should have asked about a frequent fractal rewards plan.
achievements.requirement: Number of fractals completed in the Fractals of the Mists.

achievements.name: Volcanic Fractal Stabilizer
achievements.description: It might be time to get a new pair of shoes.
achievements.requirement: You've completed the Volcanic fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

achievements.name: The Floor Is Lava. Don't Step In It.
achievements.description: All those childhood games finally paid off.
achievements.requirement: You've completed the Volcanic fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists without falling in the lava.

achievements.name: Underground Facility Fractal Stabilizer
achievements.description: Rabsovich's worst nightmare.
achievements.requirement: You've completed the Underground Facility fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

achievements.name: Carrier Cacophony
achievements.description: Not part of Rabsovich's plan.
achievements.requirement: You made it through Rabsovich's onslaught without dying while inside the Underground Facility fractal.

achievements.name: Solid Ocean Fractal Stabilizer
achievements.description: Don't forget to ride the wave.
achievements.requirement: You've completed the Solid Ocean fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

achievements.name: Open Grave
achievements.description: Pest-free ocean front property.
achievements.requirement: Your party killed all of the monsters in the Solid Ocean fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

achievements.name: Swampland Fractal Stabilizer
achievements.description: Shifting trees won't stop you. The Mossman will.
achievements.requirement: You've completed the Swampland fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

achievements.name: Fancy Footwork
achievements.description: You can't be caught that easily.
achievements.requirement: You've made it through the Swampland fractal in the Fractals of the Mists without triggering a single trap.

achievements.name: Cliffside Fractal Stabilizer
achievements.description: Off the chain.
achievements.requirement: You've completed the Cliffside fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

achievements.name: Take a Bow
achievements.description: Taller than your average friend.
achievements.requirement: You and the captured colossus of the Cliffside fractal share a moment of respect.

achievements.name: Uncategorized Fractal Stabilizer
achievements.description: Whose cat is that?
achievements.requirement: You've completed the Uncategorized fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

achievements.name: Hop, Skip, and Jump
achievements.description: It's all fun and games until someone falls.
achievements.requirement: You've made it all the way through the Uncategorized fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists without falling to your death.

achievements.name: Snowblind Fractal Stabilizer
achievements.description: I'm so cold, my frostbite has frostbite.
achievements.requirement: You've completed the Snowblind fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

achievements.name: If We Only Had Marshmallows
achievements.description: At least you'll be warm.
achievements.requirement: Your team lit every bonfire in Snowblind fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

achievements.name: Aquatic Ruins Fractal Stabilizer
achievements.description: Underwater mayhem.
achievements.requirement: You've completed the Aquatic Ruins fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

achievements.name: Flawless Fins Foil Foes
achievements.description: Just keep swimming.
achievements.requirement: As a dolphin, you evaded capture by the krait while swimming through the Aquatic Ruins fractal.

achievements.name: Urban Battleground Fractal Stabilizer
achievements.description: The city is yours! What's left of it anyways.
achievements.requirement: You've completed the Urban Battleground fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

achievements.name: Out of Cluck
achievements.description: Nothing like roast chicken after a successful siege.
achievements.requirement: While inside the Urban Battleground fractal, your team killed all the chickens in the city.

achievements.name: Holo-Hornpipe
achievements.description: It's Dance Like A Pirate Day!
achievements.requirement: Dance with the Aetherblade hologram dancers.

achievements.name: Aetherblade Retreat Stabilizer
achievements.description: They're in full retreat now.
achievements.requirement: You've completed the Aetherblade fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

achievements.name: Horrik's Horror
achievements.description: Horrik hit hard, but you hit harder.
achievements.requirement: Defeat Mai Trin's 2nd-in-command.

achievements.name: Aetherblade Captain Stabilizer
achievements.description: Mai tried, but Trin didn't win.
achievements.requirement: You've completed the Captain Mai Trin boss fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

achievements.name: Thaumanova Reactor Fractal Stabilizer
achievements.description: Thaumanova melted down, but you didn't.
achievements.requirement: You've completed the Thaumanova Reactor fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

achievements.name: Subject 6 Deep-Sixer
achievements.description: Make Subject 6 as tough as possible. You can handle it.
achievements.requirement: Defeat Subject 6 after causing it to gain maximum stacks of overcharge possible without exploding.

achievements.name: Molten Furnace Fractal Stabilizer
achievements.description: Some folks can take the heat without even sweating.
achievements.requirement: You've completed the Molten Furnace fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

achievements.name: Weapons Tester
achievements.description: Their aim wasn't so hot.
achievements.requirement: Destroy the thermal core without being struck by any molten weapon attacks.

achievements.name: Molten Boss Fractal Stabilizer
achievements.description: The Molten Alliance just lost its two heaviest hitters.
achievements.requirement: You've completed the Molten Boss fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

achievements.name: Shockwave Skipper
achievements.description: They can't hurt what they can't hit.
achievements.requirement: Defeated the leaders of the Molten Alliance without being hit by a shockwave.

achievements.name: Fractal Experience
achievements.requirement: Complete a fractal dungeon.

data.name: Fractal Encryption Key
data.description:
This key will unlock one Fractal Encryption containing bonus items from the fractals!

Fractal Encryptions can be found in the final reward chest of any fractal inside the Fractals of the Mist.

achievements.name: Firestorm Extinguisher
achievements.requirement: Defeat the Molten Firestorm before defeating the Molten Berserker in the first phase of the encounter, then defeat the upgraded Molten Berserker in the second phase of the encounter in the Molten Boss fractal.

achievements.name: Going Berserk
achievements.requirement: Defeat the Molten Berserker before defeating the Molten Firestorm in the first phase of the encounter, then defeat the upgraded Molten Firestorm in the second phase of the encounter in the Molten Boss fractal.

achievements.name: Great Heights
achievements.requirement: Defeat the Anomaly without anyone falling off the platform inside the Thaumanova Reactor fractal.

achievements.name: Master of the Molten Ore
achievements.requirement: Only use four buckets during the boss encounter of the Underground Facility fractal.

achievements.name: Stealth Bombers
achievements.requirement: Use stealth to bomb the reinforced door without triggering any security turrets or contractors within the Underground Facility fractal.

achievements.name: No Lasers!
achievements.requirement: Defeat the Jade Maw without anyone in your party being hit by its beam attack.

achievements.name: Volcano Hero
achievements.requirement: Defeat the Imbued Shaman on scale 51 or above without losing any captives.

achievements.name: Still Faster Than Light
achievements.requirement: Complete Kleptotronic Advanced Designs without being hit by lasers.

achievements.name: Fractal Initiate
achievements.description: This is only the beginning...
achievements.requirement: Complete each fractal scale from 1 to 25.

data.name: Chest of the Casual Fractal Hero
data.description: Contains 3 Pristine Fractal Relics, a Fractal Weapon Crate, and an Ascended Salvage Tool.

achievements.name: Fractal Adept
achievements.description: The journey continues...
achievements.requirement: Complete each fractal scale from 26 to 50.

data.name: Chest of the Core Fractal Hero
data.description: Contains 5 Pristine Fractal Relics and 1 Golden Fractal Relic.

achievements.name: Fractal Expert
achievements.description: Almost there...
achievements.requirement: Complete each fractal scale from 51 to 75.

data.name: Chest of the Elite Fractal Veteran
data.description: Contains 10 Pristine Fractal Relics and 2 Golden Fractal Relics.

achievements.name: Fractal Master
achievements.description: Scaled to the top!
achievements.requirement: Complete each fractal scale from 76 to 100.

data.name: Chest of the Fractal Master
data.description: Contains 1 Gold Fractal Weapon Crate, 1 Transmutation Charge, and 10 Pristine Fractal Relics.

achievements.name: Headhunter
achievements.requirement: Defeat the Legendary Archdiviner at the top of the Cliffside fractal while only killing five cultists or chanters. This does not include the initial entourage. Must be completed on scale 21 or above.

achievements.name: BUY-2046 PFR's Challenge #103
achievements.description: Once you've proven your fractal prowess, BUY-2046 PFR will sell you Fractal Gear Boxes containing your choice of fractal weapon skins.
achievements.requirement: Complete difficulty scale 50 in the Fractals of the Mists.

achievements.name: Follows Advice
achievements.description: Unlocks additional daily achievements for fractal scales 21–49.
achievements.requirement: Complete the Follows Advice tier of the Fractal Attunement Mastery.

achievements.name: Lessons in Agony
achievements.requirement: Complete difficulty scale 20 in the Fractals of the Mists.

data.name: Agony Resistance Study Supplies
data.description: Contains everything an adventurer needs to learn about agony and how to resist it.

achievements.name: Kitty Compactor
achievements.requirement: Defeat the Chaos Anomaly and each of the champion golems.

achievements.name: Notetaker
achievements.requirement: Find all 7 of the lost journal pages in Chaos Isles.

achievements.name: Chaos Demolisher
achievements.requirement: Complete the Chaos fractal on the Master tier.

data.name: Mistwild Greatsword Skin
data.description: Double-click to apply this look to any other greatsword.

achievements.name: Mistlock Mountaineer
achievements.description: Scale the rocks to the tree-topped outcrop.
achievements.requirement: Complete the jumping puzzle.

achievements.name: Falling! Screaming! Diving!
achievements.requirement: Dive into the abyss.

achievements.name: Mercy of the Mordant
achievements.description: I have to admit I'm a little disturbed by your enthusiasm.
achievements.requirement: End the suffering of all 15 downed foes in the Twilight Oasis fractal in one run.

achievements.name: Aerialist
achievements.requirement: Jump over Amala's Mystic Wave attack three times without being hit.

achievements.name: Hollow Victory
achievements.description: You committed the ultimate betrayal. Your weakness cannot be forgiven.
achievements.requirement: Complete the Twilight Oasis fractal on the Master tier.

achievements.name: One with the Mists
achievements.requirement: Purchase Mist Attunement 1.

achievements.name: Two with the Mists
achievements.requirement: Purchase Mist Attunement 2.

achievements.name: Three with the Mists
achievements.requirement: Purchase Mist Attunement 3.

achievements.name: God of the Mists
achievements.requirement: Purchase Mist Attunement 4.

achievements.name: Boots on the Ground
achievements.requirement: During your final confrontation with the Voice in the Deepstone fractal, do not fall or jump off of the platform.

achievements.name: Riches Unveiled
achievements.requirement: In the Deepstone fractal, discover all 10 hidden treasure chests in one run.

achievements.name: Of Spiders and Sentinels
achievements.requirement: In the Deepstone fractal, kill both the Brood Queen and Deepstone Sentinel within three minutes of each other.
